18.18: “yia Buaj zyen meib Bua, meib Bua yem paamb ken Dob haiq Euvg, yem uaq Tinb txvb uaq Euvg yaag zu'g Dob a'q. meib Bua yem paamb ken puvj haiq Euvg, yem uaq Tinb txvb yaag puvj uaq Euvg a'q.
18.8: “sij kxvq meib Eei puad fai zauj Duaq meib paamd zwid, xij zu'g Va'q kwavg. waaig teij favj fai zo'g Jia'q puab zauj mq paag tu'q yetg liud Eei mcvg Zxg kaub lovj maaib i Jia'q puad i Jia'q zauj mq paag zu'g zxi pia'g yetg liud zia'g Jyenq Eei trud.
18.33: meib hxpg zu'g Kxb lyenb meib Eei zruj pru txig Navq yia Kxb lyenb meib nx saa.’
18.3: yaag kxvq, “yia kxvq zyen Buaj meib Bua, Zwrtq liud meib Bua kxiq Hruq zyrug Navq fu'Jweiq nx, meib Bua yetg liud maiq tu'q pia'g Tinb huvb Eei kua'q.
18.32: uaq taub pru Eei zyruq zyrug heug ninb taaib yaag kxvq, ‘meib naaig taub waaig haig Eei nrub kauq aa'b! meib Qa'q Toq yia, yia zyrug kwavg Revg meib Qyemj yia Eei zc'q.
18.21: pi-te cvj taaib naaig kaaj ye-su, “zyruq aag, sij kxvq yia Eei kxb yrud zanb zang txvg yia, yia xij zu'g kwavg Bu'ziaj Rung pun ninb? Tauj siag Rung a'q fai?”
18.35: ye-su cvj kxvq setq mweid waag. “sij kxvq meib Bua mrud laanb myenb maiq lovg Hruq kwavg kxb yrud zruj txvg meib Bua Eei sig, yia Eei Tinb txvb tiaj yaag fib Navq Eei maiq kwavg pun meib Bua.”
18.14: fib Navq Eei, meib Bua Eei Tinb txvb tiaj maiq xij yetg taub naaiq teij faij Eei fu'Jweiq tivj laaib.
18.23: “weig zu'g Tinb huvb zruj zyruq kunq myenb se Navq naaiq. maaib taub huvb tiaj xij Zauj ninb Eei pru funj zc'q.
18.6: “mq paag sij kxvq haiq taub Duaq yetg taub naaiq teij syenj yia Eei fu'Jweib faij paamd zwid, xij zu'g zx'q tomb mxg Diuj Jyenq uaq taub Eei Jaav puvj Fiag Kxiq, Do Eei txvj, zyemj taig kaub lovj.
18.34: ninb Eei zyruq Qiaj Jiad! haig zyrug heug kunq lob Jyen txb naaiq taub pru mivb zeij Tauj ninb Jaauq suv zc'q.”
18.2: ye-su zyrug heug taub fu'Jweiq taaib pun ninb sruq Jyenq ninb Bua Eei Bu'Dovj
18.20: weig zu'g maiq kunq yem haiq nxm txvj, maaib i pua laanb myenb tevq yia Eei Buaj kapq zunq, yia zyrug yem ninb Bua Bu'Dovj.”
18.24: funj Jyenq zc'q uaq zang, myenb txb taub pru pia'g taaib. uaq taub pru Qyemj huvb tiaj ziaj pc'q waang nxm zinb,
18.28: “naaig taub pru Zwrtq mivb yaag pwavb zu'g taub zruj pru txig. naaiq taub pru Qyemj ninb i ziaj nxm zinb Navq, mq paag ninb lyemb zeib kob Jyenq naaiq taub Eei Jaav yaag kxvq, ‘kaanq Jaauq meib Qyemj yia Eei zc'q maa'b!’
18.7: laaij Duaq myenb paamd zwid Eei sig, paamb ken zyrug zu'g Kruq a'q. Duaq myenb Eei sig zanb zang xij Zwrtq, mq paag zruj kxn Duaq myenb uaq taub zuvq xij zu'g Kruq a'q.
18.29: uaq taub zruj pru txig zyrug kweig Fiag Qa'q Toq ninb, ‘Toq meib sia yia, yia kevb Jaauq Eei lx'g.’
18.19: “yia cvj Buaj meib Bua, sij kxvq meib Bua yem naaiq paamb ken maaib i laanb myenb tovb Hruq kapq eij tauj kauj Toq haiq Euvg, yia Eei Tinb txvb tiaj zuvq weig meib Bua zruj zyavj Revg.
18.17: sij kxvq uaq taub Zxg maiq mwavj ninb Bua nx, xij zu'g zx'q naaiq teij sig Buaj Revg Jiub paav. ninb Zxg maiq Kavq mwavj Jiub paav nx, xij zu'g funj ninb se Navq maiq syenj Eei myenb fai Tevj lo-maa huvb Jaa syru Rru Eei myenb.
18.31: “cvj maaib teij lomb Rxib zruj pru txig pwatg naaiq teij sig Zwrtq, haid Hruq maiq lovj yetg teij, zyrug mivb Buaj ninb Bua Eei zyruq.
18.30: mq paag ninb maiq Kavq, yaag txb uaq taub pru mivb wrnj Jyenq lob zuaq ninb Jaauq suv zc'q.
18.27: uaq taub pru Eei zyruq Kxb lyenb haig ninb zyrug kwavg ninb Eei zc'q, puvj ninb Rwrnj mig a'q.
18.11: weig zu'g yia, paamb myenb Eei txn, taaib Fruj tivj laaib Eei myenb.
18.5: haiq taub tevq yia Eei Buaj zipq taub fu'Jweiq Navq naaiq taub fu'Jweiq nx, uaq taub yaag zipq yia.
18.9: sij kxvq meib Eei mziv Duaq meib paamd zwid, xij zu'g kweij kwavg mivb. zo'g nxm mziv mq paag tu'q yetg liud Eei mcvg Zxg kaub lovj maaib i nxm mziv yaag zu'g zxi pia'g teig Eua'g Eei trud.
18.16: sij kxvq ninb maiq mwavj, meib zyrug xij zu'g lxd Jyenq yetg taub fai i taub Zauj meib mivb Tevj mwavj waag zyrug haib zx'q Jrub Jruj waag zruj zxvb zevj.
18.4: haiq taub Eyemg kanb zruj faij Navq naaiq taub fu'Jweiq, yem Tinb huvb Eei kua'q tovb naaiq taub zruj Lo Jiaj.
18.10: “xij zu'g faij fim, maiq tuvq mavg Piaj yetg taub naaiq teij faij Eei fu'Jweiq. yia Buaj meib Bua, naaiq teij fu'Jweiq Eei finb myenb yem Tinb txvb, zanb zang yem yia Eei Tinb txvb tiaj Eei Ra'Myen.
18.22: ye-su tau, “yia maiq zeid kxvq kwavg siag Rung Navq. xij zu'g kwavg Zyetq zyepg Eei siag Rung.
18.12: “meib Bua Navq haiq nx Namq? sij kxvq maaib laanb myenb maaib yetg pc'q taub pa'ki yuvb, tivj laaib taub, ninb Navq haiq nx zruj? ninb maiq zeid kwavg Jyenq uaq teij Juaq zyepg Juaq taub yem uaq Bov Eang miaq, cvj mivb lxd tivj laaib uaq taub fai?
18.15: “sij kxvq meib Eei kxb yrud zruj txvg meib, meib kanb xij zu'g mivb lxd ninb, pivj Jyenq Buaj ninb, ninb zruj txvg Eei sig. sij kxvq ninb mwavj meib Eei waag nx, meib zyrug tu'q ninb cvj zruj kxb yrud.
18.13: yia Buaj zyen meib Bua, lxd pwatg naaiq taub pa'ki yuvb, ninb a'Neiq haig. kaub a'Neiq Jiaj uaq teij Juaq zyepg Juaq taub maiq tivj laaib Eei pa'ki yuvb.
18.1: uaq zang saib kxj Bua taaib naaig ye-su, “yem Tinb huvb Eei kua'q, haiq taub tu'q zruj kaub Lo Jiaj?”
18.26: “uaq taub pru zyrug kweig Fiag Qa'q Toq ninb, ‘Toq zyruq sia yia, zuaq yia lxd tu'q taaib, yia kevb xij zu'g Jaauq Tauj suv Revg.’
18.25: yaag maiq maaib Eaanb Jaauq. huvb tiaj zyrug heug myenb txb uaq taub pru mivb maaig pun myenb zruj nrub. lyemb ninb Eei aub Jweiq Zauj ninb maaib Eei yetg zuvq ka'naaiq txb mivb maaig Revg, taaib Jaauq suv zc'q.

8.18: ye-su pwatg myenb Zamq weib kxmj ninb, zyrug Buaj saib kxj Bua txb ninb Jiaj uaq vaang zi'g Kxib txn.
8.8: pcvb pyeiq kxvq, “tomb kxj kanb maiq zu'g mivb a'q. yia maiq Pwij zipq meib pia'g yia Eei pyauq. meib Kuvj kxvq Zwrtq Navq, yia Eei pru zyrug lovj a'q.
8.33: yuvd tuvd Eei myenb pyauj pia'g muvq mivb, kxvq Revg yetg zuvq Zwrtq taaib Eei sig Zauj zinb Daavg maaib myenq yem sin uaq teij i taub myenb Eei Jaub lrug.
8.3: ye-su suv puad maan Jyenq uaq laanb myenb yaag kxvq, “yia xij zxg Eei. meib lovj taaib maa'b!” uaq laanb myenb Eei pcvg zyrug lyemb zeib lovj mig a'q.
8.32: ye-su kxvq, “mivb a'q!” myenq zyrug Zwrtq uaq teij i taub myenb mivb pia'g tuvd Revg. zyavb kwanb tuvd zyrug Tiuj Fiag Kamj Dxtq uam zyemj taig Revg mig a'q.
8.21: cvj maaib taub saib kxj Buaj ye-su, “tomb kxj aag, yia Toq Rwrnj mivb pyopq yia Eei tia Daavg.”
8.14: ye-su pia'g pi-te Eei pyauq, pwatg pi-te Eei maab tiaq putq pcvg, sin Jxm Eei, pweij Jyenq uaq Zruj.
8.23: ye-su pia'g Ravq, saib kxj Bua yaag kan Jyenq pia'g.
8.6: pcvb pyeiq kxvq, “tomb kxj aag, yia Eei pru putq pcvb Bai, pweij uaq pyauq, tiaq tu'q Kruq haig.”
8.34: yetg zivb myenb zyrug Zwrtq mivb lxd ye-su. lxd pwatg, ninb Bua Qa'q Toq ye-su Zwrtq ninb Bua Eei teib Jaaij mivb.
8.2: maaib laanb myenb putq komb huq pcvg taaib kweig Fiag ye-su Eei Ra'Myen. ninb kxvq, “tomb kxj aag, sij kxvq meib xij nx, meib haib zxg lovj yia Eei pcvg.”
8.20: ye-su kxvq Buaj ninb, “Yiab Juq maaib Bcvb Kwrtq yem, nx'g yaag maaib laud, mq paag yia, paamb myenb Eei txn, maiq maaib txvj pweij hitq Kwrnj.”
8.24: Rcv Jyenq Ravq mivb kau, lyemb zeib pxvd kxv tomb Ryaauj, pwrng uam Jiad laavg Gomd pia'g Ravq. mq paag ye-su pweij mFxmb mig a'q.
8.28: ye-su Jiaj uaq vaang zi'g Kxib txn Tauj kaa-Daa-laa teig. maaib i taub myenb yem zrub kemb Zwrtq taaib pwavb zu'g ye-su. naaiq teij i taub myenb maaib myenq yem ninb Bua Eei sin, ninb Bua zyrug Zyruq haig. maiq maaib haiq taub kaamq yavb uaq tiub Jauq.
8.7: ye-su kxvq, “yia xij mivb zxg ninb lovj.”
8.29: naaiq teij i taub myenb lyemb zeib heug Bwi Eei, “Tinb huvb Eei txn aa'b! meib taaib yia Bua naaiq zruj haiq Euvg? zyavb hog maiq kcvb Tauj meib taaib zeij yia Bua fai?”
8.19: uaq zang maaib taub Faauj leid Eei finb scv taaib lxd ye-su. ninb kxvq, “finb scv aa'b! maiq kunq finb scv mivb haaij, yia xij kan meib mivb a'q.”
8.17: ninb Navq naaiq zruj weig pun ninb zruj Eei sig Zwrtq taaib txij trug waag myenb, i-saa-yaa, kxvq Eei waag. i-saa-yaa kxvq, “ninb Daam yia Bua Eei pcvg Tovj, yaag Teij yia Bua Eei ze'g naang.”
8.31: naaiq teij myenq zyrug Toq ye-su, “meib zung yia Bua Zwrtq nx, pun yia Bua mivb pia'g uaq kwanb tuvd maa'b!”
8.30: maaib yetg tomb kwanb tuvd leib uaq ko teij Eei lxd Eang.
8.27: saib kxj Bua Bua'g hxvb haig yaag kxvq, “naaiq haiq Euvg myenb x'b? lyemb Ryaauj Zauj uamb laavg yaag mwavj ninb Eei waag.”
8.11: yia yaag Buaj meib Bua, maaib myenb Zamq Eei yem tov puv Zauj fai puv xij taaib yem Tinb huvb Eei kua'q Zauj apg-laa-ham, i-sakg Zauj yaa-Kopq Jwavg tiab Eang Naavj.
8.5: ye-su pia'g Kaa-pe-naa-um muvq uaq zang, maaib taub lo-maa pcvb pyeiq taaib lxd ninb, Toq ninb Tevj.
8.9: yia kanb yaag yem tomb pcvb pyeiq Eei puab Diaq, yaag maaib pcv Zamq yem yia Eei ka'Diaq mcvj. yia heug naaiq taub mivb, ninb zyrug mivb, heug uaq taub taaib, ninb zyrug taaib. heug yia Eei nrub zruj naaiq, ninb zyrug zruj a'q.”
8.16: luvb maanb Mwavj, maaib myenb txb zu'g myenq mua'q Eei myenb Zamq Eei taaib lxd ye-su. ye-su kxvq Du'g Jruj waag Navq zyrug zung myenq Zwrtq Revg mig a'q. taub taub Eei pcvg yaag zxg lovj Revg.
8.4: ye-su cvj kxvq Buaj ninb, “maiq tuvq Buaj haiq taub og. pcv za'g Eei mivb sai myenb uaq pun ninb zaab mavg. mavg liud, xij zu'g ei mo-se fiaq Eei leid txb scvb Kuq mivb ziag pun Tinb huvb weig saaj meib Eei wij, zruj zxvb zevj pun ninb Bua hiuq tu'q meib Eei pcvg lovj Revg.”
8.10: ye-su haid naaiq teij waag ninb Bua'g hxvb haig zyrug Buaj kan ninb taaib uaq teij myenb, “yia kxvq zyen Buaj meib Bua, yia maiq pwatg Jiaj myenb syenj Dovg naaiq lovj. lyemb i-saa-laa-en myenb yaag maiq maaib yetg taub.
8.22: ye-su tau, “sweib Janb taig kanb pyopq ninb Bua kanb Eei Janb taig a'q. kan Jyenq yia taaib maa'b!”
8.12: mq paag hxpg zu'g penj Tinb huvb Eei kua'q Eei myenb uaq teij, taauj Rwrnj zu'g zung Zwrtq ka'Eiag Mwavj Eei txvj, yem uaq puvb siv puvb Qiaj Eei Eyemq, vaatg Jyenq Eaab tiaq.”
8.15: ye-su nanq ninb Eei puad, sin zyrug laavb mig a'q. ninb zyrug Jiad sin taaib fub suj ye-su.
8.13: ye-su cvj Buaj pcvb pyeiq, “kunq Rwrnj pyauq a'q. ei meib syenj Eei, za'kevb xij Navq naaiq nx Zwrtq taaib a'q.” txij uaq nxm zyavb hog ninb Eei pru zyrug lovj mig a'q.
8.1: ye-su yem Bov Fiag taaib uaq zang, maaib myenb Zamq! Eei kan Jyenq ninb mivb.
8.26: ye-su tau, “meib Bua weig haiq tiug Dovg naaig kamb Riaj? meib Bua syenj tu'q hei haig wei'b!” ye-su zyrug Jiad sin taaib hatg Ryaauj Zauj uamb laavg. tomb Ryaauj zyrug tivb mig a'q. uamb laavg yaag haapq. haiq Euvg yaag sekq Revg mig a'q.
8.25: saib kxj Bua mivb heug ninb Eia taaib. ninb Bua kxvq, “zyruq aa'b! zyruq! kaanq Fruj mcvg oq! Dxtq uam taig a'q lo'b!”

3.3: trug waag myenb, i-saa-yaa, kxvq Eei, se tovb naaiq taub yo-han a'q. i-saa-yaa kxvq, “maaib laanb myenb yem teib puvb Waav heug Jyenq kxvq, ‘xij zu'g liug leid zyruq Eei Jauq. ninb Eei Jauq xij zu'g Kxi za'g Eei.’+”
3.8: meib Bua zruj sig xij zu'g pun Ziv meib Bua kxiq Hruq kwavg zwid.
3.9: yaag maiq tuvq yem Hruq Namq, ‘yia Bua maaib apg-laa-ham zruj yia Bua Eei ovb Taaij.’ yia Buaj meib Bua, Tinb huvb zuvq haib zx'q naaiq teij la'pyeiq zruj penj apg-laa-ham Eei zeib fun.’
3.7: yo-han pwatg faa-li-sij myenb Zauj saa-Du-sij myenb Zamq Eei taaib lxd ninb, xij Jiaj uam Eei leid zyrug kxvq ninb Bua. ninb kxvq, “meib Bua naaig Dwi naavb to'g Eei pwrnq aa'b! Tinb huvb tivg zwid  Eei zyavb hog xij Tauj. haiq taub Kwinj meib Bua pyauj Dutq?
3.5: myenb yem ye-lu-saa-lem zivb Zauj kxmj yu-Dia scvq Zauj Jx-Dcn Daaib Len yetg zuvq hxvg zavg Eei txvj, Zwrtq mivb lxd yo-han.
3.16: ye-su Jiaj leid yem uam yetq Zwrtq taaib uaq zang, luvb zyrug Gxi. ye-su pwatg Tinb huvb Eei sivj livb Fiag taaib Navq nx'g Go nx, yaag Ropg Jyenq ninb.
3.17: maaib Qiaj yem kub vwaaig luvb kxvq, “naaiq se yia Eei txnb Namq. yia za'kevb a'Neiq haig ninb.”
3.14: mq paag yo-han xij ye-su kxiq za'eij, ninb zyrug kxvq, “hxpg zu'g meib Tevj yia Jiaj leid, mq paag meib taaib lxd yia?”
3.4: yo-han zu'q Eei lwib hruj lovg lxb Txb pyei Datq taaib, yaag lovg Dopg Laav sai Jyenq Jaaiq. ninb Eang Eei ka'naaiq se Jopg Eeig Zauj lomg Eei mweib txvb.
3.2: ninb kxvq, “xij zu'g kxiq Hruq kwavg meib Bua Eei zwid, weig zu'g Tinb huvb taaib zruj zyruq kunq myenb Eei zyavb hog Tauj fatq a'q.”
3.6: ninb Bua Eyemg ninb Bua Eei zwid, yo-han zyrug yem uaq Jx-Dcn Daaib Tevj ninb Bua Jiaj uam Eei leid.
3.13: uaq zang ye-su yem kaa-li-li mivb Jx-Dcn Daaib, xij yo-han Tevj ninb Jiaj uam Eei leid.
3.12: ninb Eei puad nanq Jyenq ka'naaib Zenq, xij fyruj Revg ninb Eei Bx'q Byaub Zyavq yaag syru ninb Eei Byaub tapq lamd. mq paag Zu'g mauj ninb xij lovg yetg liud maiq haib taig Eei trud puaq Jyenq.”
3.15: ye-su tau yo-han, “meib kunq Tevj yia a'q. Bua Navq naaiq zruj, se zruj tu'q hxpg Revg ei Tinb huvb xij Bua zruj Eei.” yo-han zyrug Tevj a'q.
3.11: “yia lovg uam Tevj meib Bua Jiaj leid, pun Ziv meib Bua kxiq Hruq kwavg zwid. mq paag yia taaib Daavg, cvj maaib taub Ga'haaq taaib. ninb zruj kaub Lo yia. yia zuvq maiq Pwij Tevj ninb Nevj heb. ninb xij lovg sivj livb yaag lovg trud Tevj meib Bua Jiaj leid.
3.1: zyavb hog Tauj, Tevj myenb Jiaj uam Eei leid uaq taub yo-han mivb uaq yu-Dia teib puvb Waav zunb tod.
3.10: ib zang Beng zyavj pruq, zuvq an Jyenq Dyavb kxn. haiq tiub Dyavj zyavb pyruq maiq Kuq, xij zu'g kxij kwavg puaq trud mivb.

21.18: ta'Eeig Dxm Ryruq Eei, ye-su Rwrnj zivb uaq zang, ninb Hruq sia.
21.45: sai myenb pyeiq Zauj faa-li-sij myenb mwavj haid ye-su kxvq naaiq teij waab peiq, ninb Bua haid zi'q zu'g ninb Bua.
21.3: sij kxvq haiq taub kxvq haiq Euvg, xij zu'g Buaj ninb, ‘zyruq Qyemj zu'g lovg ninb Bua.’ maa-li Eei zyruq zyrug lyemb zeib pun meib Bua Ken Jyenq taaib.”
21.43: ye-su cvj kxvq Buaj ninb Bua, “yia Buaj meib Bua, Tinb huvb zuvq maiq pun meib Bua yem ninb Eei kua'q. ninb xij pun zruj hxpg ninb Eei Hruq uaq Euvg myenb yem ninb Eei kua'q Navq.
21.14: mziv mcvb Zauj zauj Bai Eei myenb mivb uaq zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq lxd ye-su, ye-su yaag zxg lovj ninb Bua.
21.34: “Tauj pyruq zua'g Eei zyavb hog ninb Paaiq ninb Eei pru mivb zx'q ninb Eei pwrng pyruq.
21.2: Buaj zyavj ninb Bua, “xij zu'g mivb Ra'Myen uaq nxm laavd. yetq pia'g laavd zyrug pwatg taub maa-li Eeid Dob Jyenq uaq, cvj Zauj ninb Eei txn. xij zu'g Jaiq Ken taaib pun yia.
21.36: Wivb zyruq cvj Paaiq kanb teij pru mivb, kaub Zamq taaub Rung, mq paag kruq Wivj myenb cvj zruj pun ninb Bua Navq taaub Rung uaq teij nx.
21.35: kruq Wivj Eei myenb zx'q naaiq teij pru. maaib taub ninb Bua Bx'q. maaib taub ninb Bua taij. maaib taub ninb Bua zx'q la'pyeiq taaib zov.
21.24: ye-su tau, “yia mq paag xij naaig Jruj waag meib Bua. sij kxvq meib Bua tau yia, yia zyrug Buaj meib Bua, yia maaib haiq Euvg leid zruj naaiq teij sig.
21.7: ninb Bua Ken maa-li Eeid Zauj ninb Eei txn taaib, yaag zx'q ninb Bua Eei tomb lwi timg Jyenq maa-li Eei ti'g taand. ye-su zyrug keb Jyenq a'q.
21.17: ye-su zyrug leib ninb Bua cvj Zwrtq zivb mivb Be-Taa-ni laavd pweij mwrnd.
21.11: zwavj myenb tau, “naaiq se yem kaa-li-li scvq, naa-saa-letq muvq taaib Eei trug waag myenb, ye-su.”
21.33: ye-su cvj Buaj sai myenb pyeiq Zauj myenb koj, “cvj mwavj tiub waab peiq og. maaib laanb myenb zwavj Rov a'vung pyruq, zruj laatg laatg Jyenq. yem Wivj ka'Euad ninb wetq nxm txvj zruj Eweib a'vung pyruq Eei zxvb, cvj zruj nxm laaub zuaq Wivj. zruj zyavj, ninb kruq pun myenb. ninb kanb c'q, Zwrtq teib puv mig a'q.
21.16: ninb Bua naaig ye-su, “naaiq teij fu'Jweiq kxvq Eei waag meib haid Eei fai?” ye-su tau, “haid Eei lx'g. meib Bua maiq to'g Jiaj naaiq teij kivb sru Eei waag fai? ‘meib pun fu'Jweib faij Zauj Zxg hopq Exj Eei kub vwaad haib Zev tu'q tunb yunb.’+”
21.40: ye-su naaig, “uaq Euvg, Wivb zyruq Rwrnj uaq zang ninb xij Navq haiq nx zruj pun kruq Wivj Eei myenb?”
21.37: Ga'haaq uaq Rung, Wivb zyruq cvj Paaiq ninb kanb Eei txn mivb, yaag kxvq, ‘ninb Bua zuvq xij Taaib yia Eei txn a'q.’
21.4: naaiq teij sig Zwrtq taaib weig pun txij Revg zinb Daavg trug waag myenb kxvq Eei waag. ninb kxvq,
21.12: ye-su pia'g zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq yaag zung Zwrtq Revg yetg zuvq maaid maaig Eei myenb. ninb puvj Kiv Tiuq Eaanb uaq teij myenb Eei tiab Zauj maaig pc'g kopq uaq teij myenb Eei tavj.
21.46: ninb Bua zyrug xij zx'q ninb mq paag kamb Riaj zwavj myenb, weig zu'g uaq teij myenb Taaib ye-su zruj taub trug waag myenb.
21.13: ninb kxvq Buaj ninb Bua, “kivb sru fiaq Jyenq kxvq, ‘yia Eei pyauq, myenb xij heug zruj tauj kauj Eei pyauq.’ mq paag meib Bua lovg zruj ‘Janb za'g pivj Eei Kwrtq.’+”
21.26: sij kxvq Bua kxvq, ‘myenb pun taaib,’ kamb Riaj zwavj myenb xij Navq haiq nx zruj pun Bua, weig zu'g ninb Bua yetg zuvq funj tivg yo-han se trug waag myenb.”
21.28: “meib Bua Navq haiq nx Namq? maaib laanb myenb maaib i taub txn. ninb mivb Buaj txnb Lo, ‘txn aag, meib ib Nxi mivb a'vung Wivj zruj kov og.’
21.8: maaib myenb Zamq haig lovg ninb Bua Eei tomb lwi timg Jyenq Jauq, yaag maaib myenb kc'q Dyavb nxmb yetg txq yetg txq Eei timg Jyenq.
21.9: mivb Daavg Eei, Zauj Ga'haaq Eei zwavj myenb lomb Rxib heug, “ho-saa-naa! Zev Daa-witq Eei zeib fun. Toq Tinb huvb Zeij fu'q tevq zyruq Eei Buaj taaib uaq taub. ho-saa-naa, Zev yem Lav Jiaj Eei txvj uaq taub Tinb huvb.”
21.32: weig zu'g Tevj myenb Jiaj uam Eei leid uaq taub yo-han taaib pun meib Bua hiuq tu'q zruj hxpg Eei Jauq, meib Bua yaag maiq syenj. mq paag syru Rrub zinb Zauj maaig pwrnb sin Eei msia'q txn uaq teij syenj ninb. meib Bua pwatg liud naaiq teij sig mq paag Ga'haaq meib Bua Zxg maiq kxiq Hruq syenj ninb.”
21.21: ye-su tau, “yia Buaj zyen meib Bua, sij kxvq meib Bua za'kevb syenj yaag maiq Luvb Lwrtq, meib Bua haib zruj Navq yia zruj pun naaiq zuvb vovb Exj Dyavj nx. maiq taan naaiq Navq, meib Bua zuvq haib Buaj naaiq nxm Bov, “swiq Zwrtq, Fiag Kxiq maa'b!” Bov zyrug swiq a'q.
21.23: ye-su cvj Rwrnj zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq. Faauj Jyenq myenb uaq zang, sai myenb pyeiq Zauj pc'g fivj Eei myenb koj taaib naaig ninb, “meib maaib haiq Euvg leid zruj naaiq teij sig? naaiq Euvg leid haiq taub pun meib?”
21.6: uaq teij i taub saib kxj zyrug mivb ei Jyenq ye-su Buaj Eei waag zruj.
21.44: haiq taub Dxpg, zov zu'g naaiq nxm la'pyeiq, uaq taub zyrug huq penj ziaj teij mig a'q. naaiq nxm la'pyeiq Dxtq, zov zu'g haiq taub, uaq taub zyrug mwrng Revg mig a'q.”
21.20: saib kxj Bua pwatg zyrug Bua'g hxvb haig yaag naaig kaaj, “naaiq zuvb vovb Exj Dyavj Navq haiq nx haib Gaai Dovg naaig syepq?”
21.5: “xij zu'g Buaj si-on zivb Eei myenb, ‘mavg maa'b! meib Bua Eei huvb taaib meib Bua naaiq. ninb Hruq swrng Eei, keb Jyenq maa-li taaib, keb Jyenq maa-li Eei txn.’+”
21.19: ninb pwatg uaq Jaub Len maaib zuvb vovb Exj Dyavj zyrug mivb mavg, pwatg maiq maaib pyruq. Kuvj maaib Dyavb nxmb Navq. ninb zyrug zyavq Jyenq Dyavj kxvq, “yem naaiq mivb meib yetg liud maiq tu'q zyavb pyruq a'q.” uaq zuvb vovb Exj Dyavj zyrug lyemb zeib Kru Gaai mig a'q.
21.38: mq paag kruq Wivj Eei myenb pwatg uaq taub txn, laanb Buaj laanb, ‘Ripg naaiq nxm Wivj se tovb naaiq taub a'q. taaib maa'b! Bua zx'q ninb taij kwavg mivb yaag zx'q ninb Ripg Eei Jaab tivb a'q.’
21.31: “naaiq teij i taub txn, haiq taub ei Jyenq tia Eei waag zruj?” ninb Bua tau, “txnb Lo.” ye-su zyrug Buaj ninb Bua, “yia Buaj zyen meib Bua, Tevj lo-maa huvb Jaa syru Rrub zinb uaq teij, Zauj maaig pwrnb sin Eei msia'q txn zuvq tu'q pia'g Tinb huvb Eei kua'q Daavg meib Bua.
21.27: ninb Bua zyrug tau ye-su, “yia Bua maiq hiuq tu'q.” ye-su Buaj ninb Bua, “Navq naaig, yia yaag maiq Buaj meib Bua yia maaib haiq Euvg leid zruj naaiq teij sig.
21.41: ninb Bua tau, “ninb Dovg haaij zuvq xij taij kwavg uaq teij waaig haig Eei myenb, cvj pun kanb teij myenb kruq ninb Eei Wivj, tovb pyruq zua'g Eei zyavb hog haib pun ninb Eei pwrng pyruq uaq Euvg myenb.”
21.1: ye-su Zauj ninb Eei saib kxj mivb Tauj fatq teij ye-lu-saa-lem zivb. yem ka'lanq Bov, Betg-faa-yi uaq nxm laavd, ye-su zyrug Paaiq i taub saib kxj mivb Daavg,
21.39: ninb Bua zyrug zx'q ninb Tx Zwrtq ka'Eiag zi'g Wivj taij kwavg mig a'q.”
21.10: ye-su pia'g ye-lu-saa-lem uaq zang, yetg zivb myenb zyrug Waav Jiad Revg taaib, laanb naaig laanb, “naaiq taub myenb tovb haiq taub x'b?”
21.25: uaq Euvg, haiq taub pun yo-han maaib leid Tevj myenb Jiaj uam Eei leid, Tinb huvb fai paamb myenb?” ninb Bua zyrug laanb Zauj laanb Zaavb laavb. “Bua hxpg zu'g Navq haiq nx kxvq mq pei? sij kxvq Bua kxvq, ‘Tinb huvb pun taaib,’ ninb xij kxvq, ‘uaq Euvg, meib Bua weig haiq tiug maiq syenj yo-han?’
21.22: sij kxvq meib Bua syenj, maiq kunq meib Bua tauj kauj Toq haiq Euvg, meib Bua zyrug tu'q a'q.”
21.42: ye-su Buaj ninb Bua, “kivb sru fiaq Jyenq naaiq teij waag meib Bua maiq to'g Jiaj fai? ‘komq pyauq zavg Gemb Zwrtq uaq nxm la'pyeiq, zuvq penj an pyaub kx'q kaub lovg Jyenq Jiaj uaq nxm. naaiq se zyruq zruj Eei sig. ziuj yia Bua Eei mziv mavg, pwatg Bua'g hxvb haig.’+”
21.15: mq paag sai myenb pyeiq Zauj Faauj leid Eei finb scv pwatg ye-su zruj naaiq teij Bua'g hxvb Eei sig, yaag haid fu'Jweiq yem zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq heug Jyenq kxvq, “oq, ho-saa-naa, Zev Daa-witq Eei zeib fun oq!” ninb Bua zyrug Qiaj Jiad haig.
21.29: “txnb Lo tau, ‘yia maiq xij mivb!’ mq paag Ga'haaq ninb kxiq Hruq cvj mivb a'q.
21.30: “uaq taub tia cvj mivb fib Navq Eei Buaj txnb faij. txnb faij tau, ‘od, yia mivb Eei.’ mq paag ninb maiq mivb.

14.8: naaiq taub sia'q ziuj ninb Eei maa Buaj Eei waag kxvq, “Toq ib zang zx'q Tevj myenb Jiaj uam Eei leid uaq taub yo-han Eei mGxvq an Jyenq Tx'g syenj txb taaib pun yia og.”
14.33: yem Ravq uaq teij zyrug paaij ye-su. ninb Bua kxvq, “zyruq aa'b! meib za'kevb Tinb huvb Eei txn a'q.”
14.3: zinb Daavg he-lotq, laaij ninb Eei yrud fi-lipq Eei auq, he-lo-Dyetg, zx'q yo-han Dob Jyenq txb mivb wrnj lob,
14.32: ninb Bua i taub pia'g Ravq. Ryaauj zyav naaig tivb mig a'q.
14.21: Eang Eei myenb, taan mJavg txn Navq, maaib leib maiq ko pyaa Zin taub. msia'q txn Zauj fu'Jweiq maiq funj.
14.35: yem uaq nxm txvj myenb zia'q tu'q ye-su zyrug pun waag mivb kxmj uaq nxm hxvg zavg. myenb zyrug txb yetg zuvq pcvg myenb Tauj ye-su uaq
14.14: ye-su Zwrtq Ravq faauj Byenj mivb, pwatg myenb Zamq haig. ninb haid Kxb lyenb haig ninb Bua, zyrug zxg lovj Revg ninb Bua Eei pcvg.
14.23: zwavj myenb Raanj Revg, ye-su kanb faauj Bovb aiq mivb tauj kauj. luvb maanb Mwavj a'q, ye-su kanb Zxg yem uaq Eei.
14.6: zruj kau, Tauj he-lotq Eei sib Eyetg Nxi, he-lo-Dyetg Eei sia'q yem zwavj Kc'q myenb Eei Ra'Myen Zavj heij. he-lotq kevb a'Neiq haig
14.34: ninb Bua Jiaj uaq vaang zi'g Kxib txn zyrug Tauj ken-ne-saa-letq teig.
14.2: zyrug Buaj ninb Eei sinb Len myenb, “naaiq taub Dovg haaij zuvq tovb Tevj myenb Jiaj uam Eei leid uaq taub yo-han cvj navb taaib a'q, ninb Zivj taaib maaib naaiq Euvg Qa'q zruj Bua'g hxvb Eei sig.”
14.36: Toq ye-su pun pcvg myenb Kuvj Lua zu'g ninb Eei lwib Jua'q. haiq taub Lua zu'g, pcvg zyrug lovj mig a'q.
14.20: zwavj myenb Eang peuq Revg. zevg Fiag uaq teij, saib kxj Bua syru taaib tu'q zyepg Eeig Daan pwavq.
14.24: txij uaq nxm zyavb hog saib kxj Bua Eei Ravq leib Byenj ko haig a'q. Ravq zu'g uamb laavg myetq mivb myetq taaib Eei, laaij Ryaauj Duvg Jyenq.
14.28: pi-te zyrug kxvq, “zyruq aa'b! sij kxvq zeid meib nx, heug yia yavb uamb ming mivb meib naaig.”
14.7: zyrug lcvd waag pun uaq taub sia'q, “maiq kunq meib xij lovg haiq Euvg, yia lcvd pun meib a'q.”
14.29: ye-su kxvq, “taaib maa'b!” pi-te zyrug Zwrtq Ravq yavb uamb ming huvj Jyenq ye-su mivb.
14.19: ye-su heug zwavj myenb zweid Jyenq maaib miaq Eei txvj. ninb cvj zx'q uaq teij pyaa nxm Fuaq Zauj i taub Byaud taaib, Zau Myen mavg luvb, lcvd zivb Tinb huvb liud zyrug mc'q Gxi pun saib kxj. saib kxj Bua txb mivb pun zwavj myenb Eang.
14.17: saib kxj Bua kxvq, “yem naaiq yia Bua Kuvj maaib pyaa nxm Fuaq Zauj i taub Byaud Navq.”
14.31: ye-su lyemb zeib suv puad nanq Jyenq ninb yaag kxvq, “meib syenj tu'q hei haig. meib Eei Hruq weig haiq tiug Buvb Byenq?”
14.30: mq paag pi-te pwatg Ryaauj Lo, hc'q ninb kamb Riaj haig zyrug zemb Jyenq Fiag. ninb heug, “zyruq aa'b! zyruq! Fruj yia maa'b!”
14.27: ye-su lyemb zeib kxvq Buaj ninb Bua, “kunq puvj Hruq maa'b! se tovb yia, maiq tuvq kamb Riaj.”
14.11: ninb Bua zx'q mGxvq taaib an Jyenq Tx'g syenj prub taaib pun uaq taub sia'q. sia'q yaag Jiu pun ninb Eei maa.
14.5: he-lotq zyrug Jiad Hruq xij taij yo-han mq paag ninb kamb Riaj pc'g fivj weig zu'g yiu-Tai myenb Taaib yo-han zruj taub trug waag myenb.
14.9: he-lotq huvb Raub haig mq paag laaij ninb txv Jyenq Kc'q myenb lcvd liud vcvg waag ninb zyrug Fiag livg ei uaq taub sia'q Eei waag zruj.
14.16: ye-su tau, “ninb Bua maiq zu'g mivb lx'g. meib Bua kanb lxd pun ninb Bua Eang maa'b!”
14.4: weig zu'g yo-han zanb zang kxvq Buaj he-lotq, “meib maiq maaib leid lovg he-lo-Dyetg zruj auq.”
14.10: ninb Paaiq myenb mivb uaq lob Va'q Dutq yo-han Eei mGxvq.
14.22: ye-su zyrug pe'q saib kxj Bua pia'g Ravq mivb Daavg, Jiaj uaq vaang zi'g Kxib txn. ninb kanb yem uaq heug myenb pun Raanj Rwrnj Revg.
14.12: yo-han Eei saib kxj Bua mivb zx'q sei txb mivb zavj. zavj liud, ninb Bua zyrug mivb Buaj ye-su mig a'q.
14.15: luvb maanb Mwavj, saib kxj Bua taaib Buaj ye-su, “luvb aaq lamb Mwavj a'q. naaiq yaag levb Eei txvj. Toq Buaj zwavj myenb mivb a'q. ninb Bua zyrug haib mivb maaib laavd Eei txvj maaid Eang.”
14.13: ye-su haid liud naaiq teij sig, ninb kanb zyrug pia'g Ravq Zwrtq uaq cvj mivb levb Eei txvj. zwavj myenb hiuq tu'q zyrug Zwrtq ninb Bua Eei muvq yavb Jauq kan Jyenq ye-su mivb.
14.1: uaq zang kunq kaa-li-li scvq uaq taub he-lotq huvb mwavj haid ye-su Eei Jaub lrug
14.26: saib kxj Bua pwatg ninb yavb uamb ming taaib, ninb Bua zyrug kamb Riaj! haig. ninb Bua kxvq, “aaq, naaiq Janb taig Fxid saa'b!” zyrug hc'q ninb Bua waib waid Eei heug.
14.25: luvb aaq lamb Fav, pua nxm Tauj Ju'q nxm zyavb hog Bu'Dovj, ye-su yavb uamb ming mivb saib kxj Bua uaq.

23.18: meib Bua yaag kxvq, ‘haiq taub zyavq Jyenq ziab txvb lcvd waag yaag maiq ei Jyenq ninb lcvd Eei waag zruj, maiq penj haiq Euvg. mq paag haiq taub zyavq an ziab txvb kub vwaaig uaq teij ziag Eei ka'naaiq lcvd nx, zuvq xij zu'g ei Jyenq ninb lcvd Eei waag zruj.’
23.8: “maiq tuvq pun myenb heug meib Bua zruj ‘saib tiaj’ weig zu'g meib Bua yetg zuvq zruj kxb yrud. meib Bua Kuvj maaib Du'g taub saib tiaj Navq.
23.33: “meib Bua naaig teij naav, naaig Dwi naavb to'g Eei pwrnq aa'b! meib Bua Navq haiq nx haib pyauj tu'q Dutq, maiq zu'g tivg zwid Dxtq teig Eua'g?
23.3: weig naaiq meib Bua xij zu'g mwavj yaag ei Jyenq ninb Bua Faauj Eei waag zruj. mq paag ninb Bua zruj Eei sig meib Bua maiq tuvq zwrtg, weig zu'g ninb Bua Faauj mq paag maiq ei ninb Bua Faauj Eei waag zruj.
23.32: uaq Euvg, kunq zruj Jyenq mivb Tauj zruj zyavj Navq meib Eei ovb Taaij zruj nx.
23.21: haiq taub zyavq Jyenq zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq lcvd waag, ninb zuvq zyavq Jyenq zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Zauj yem pyauq ka'Euad uaq taub Tinb huvb lcvd waag.
23.35: Navq naaig, yetg zuvq Kuq myenb zu'g taij taig, naaiq Euvg zwid Dxtq zu'g meib Bua, yem aa-Bcn zu'g taij Tauj Be-le-Ki-yaa Eei txn, sej-Kaa-li-yaa, yem zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Eei Zivb Revg txvj Zauj ziab txvb Bu'Dovj zu'g meib Bua taij.
23.14: meib Bua peib za'g Hruq Fwrtq Faauj leid Eei finb scv Zauj faa-li-sij myenb aa'b! meib Bua xij pwavb zu'g Kruq a'q. meib Bua Duaq aub kwaaq Eei Jaab tivb Eang, yaag tu'g eij tauj kauj Daauq Eei Duaq myenb. weig naaiq meib Bua zuvq zu'g tivg zwid kaub Niaq Jiaj.
23.23: “meib Bua peib za'g Hruq Fwrtq Faauj leid Eei finb scv Zauj faa-li-sij myenb aa'b! meib Bua xij pwavb zu'g Kruq a'q. meib Bua txb pc'g Zitq, Tovb hau Zauj yenb si zyepg kruq Eei yetg kruq fovg hxg Tinb huvb. leib latg Faauj kaub lovg Jyenq Jiaj Eei leid se xij zu'g zruj pcvb fim, xij zu'g Kxb lyenb myenb, xij zu'g zruj Hruq zivj, mq paag meib Bua maiq zruj. meib Bua hxpg zu'g Navq naaiq zruj, yaag xij zu'g maiq tuvq la'Ku'q zyepg kruq Eei yetg kruq ka'naaiq fovg hxg Tinb huvb.
23.6: mivb yinb wig, ninb Bua Kuvj xij zweid Jiaj mcvj puv tiab kxn Navq. pia'g wig txvb yaag xij zweid lovj Jiaj Eei txvj.
23.34: weig naaiq yia xij Paaiq teij trug waag myenb Zauj Zovb mevb Eei myenb Zauj finb scv taaib lxd meib Bua. maaib teij meib Bua xij taij taig. maaib teij meib Bua xij tiv zyepg Ravg Jaaj. maaib teij meib Bua xij yem wig txvb ka'Euad lovg pyaab pin Bx'q, cvj zruj to'g pun ninb Bua yetg nxm muvq zung Zwrtq Jiaj yetg nxm muvq.
23.2: “Faauj leid Eei finb scv Zauj faa-li-sij myenb maaib leid Pxq mevb mo-se Eei leid.
23.36: yia kxvq zyen Buaj meib Bua, ib Jaaj myenb xij zu'g laaij naaiq teij taij myenb Eei sig zu'g tivg zwid.
23.20: Navq naaig, haiq taub zyavq Jyenq ziab txvb lcvd waag, ninb zuvq zyavq Jyenq ziab txvb Zauj an ziab txvb kub vwaaig uaq teij ziag Eei ka'naaiq yetg zuvq.
23.24: meib Bua txb Jauq Eei mziv mcvb myenb aa'b! yem meib Bua hopq Eei ka'naaiq, faij Jiaj Eei kcv meib Bua lrug Zwrtq mig a'q. mq paag lxb Txb meib Bua na'q tu'q Fiag Eei.
23.28: meib Bua fib Navq Eei. myenb pwatg meib Bua se Navq Kuq myenb mq paag meib Bua peib za'g Hruq Fwrtq, maaib zwid pwavq Revg.
23.7: mivb uaq heib hxvg xij myenb zx'q yia'q Taaib ninb Bua, yaag heug ninb Bua zruj ‘saib tiaj.’
23.29: “peib za'g Hruq Fwrtq Faauj leid Eei finb scv Zauj faa-li-sij myenb aa'b! meib Bua xij pwavb zu'g Kruq a'q. trug waag myenb taig mivb, meib Bua Zeij tu'q ninb Bua Eei zruq lovj haig. Kuq myenb Eei zruq meib Bua yaag zxv tu'q Rweig.
23.19: mziv mcvb Eei myenb aa'b! haiq Euvg kaub lovg Jyenq Jiaj? ziag Eei ka'naaiq fai ziab txvb? se ziab txvb pun ziag Eei ka'naaiq Zivb Revg.
23.17: “mziv mcvb Eei ka'naaib Vovj aa'b! haiq Euvg kaub lovg Jyenq Jiaj? Jyem fai pun Jyem Zivb Revg uaq nxm zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq?
23.38: mavg maa'b! meib Eei pyauq zuvq zu'g kwavg penj pyaub Waav.
23.31: Navq naaig, meib Bua lcvd meib Bua zruj taij trug waag myenb uaq teij myenb Eei zeib fun.
23.30: meib Bua yaag kxvq, ‘sij kxvq yia Bua yem yia Bua Eei ovb Taaib vc'q uaq Jaaj luvb Diaq, yia Bua zuvq maiq Zauj yia Bua Eei ovb Taaib vc'q taij trug waag myenb.’
23.27: “meib Bua peib za'g Hruq Fwrtq Faauj leid Eei finb scv Zauj faa-li-sij myenb aa'b! meib Bua xij pwavb zu'g Kruq a'q. meib Bua se Navq Raatq Jyenq Wib pc'g Eei Janb taig zruq nx. pwatg ka'Eiag Rweig Eei, mq paag ka'Euad maaib Janb taig Eei Buvq Zauj Euvb Euvg laib Lopq Eei ka'naaiq pwavq Revg.
23.11: “meib Bua haiq taub zruj Lo Jiaj, uaq taub xij zu'g zruj meib Bua Eei pru.
23.5: “ninb Bua zruj Eei yetg zuvq se weig pun myenb mavg Navq. mavg kaaj, ninb Bua Eei pyxvb Zauj puad tavb Jyenq tapq kivb sru Eei waag uaq Euvg Lapq Dovg haaij Lo! tivj lwib Jua'q uaq teij Givb Gru Dovg haaij Daauq!
23.9: maiq tuvq heug yem naaiq paamb ken Eei haiq taub zruj ‘tia,’ weig zu'g meib Bua maaib Du'g taub tia Navq. se yem Tinb txvb uaq taub tia.
23.16: “meib Bua txb Jauq Eei mziv mcvb myenb aa'b! meib Bua xij pwavb zu'g Kruq a'q. meib Bua kxvq, ‘haiq taub zyavq Jyenq zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq lcvd waag, maiq ei Jyenq ninb lcvd Eei waag zruj, maiq penj haiq Euvg. mq paag haiq taub zyavq Jyenq zxv zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq uaq teij Jyem, zuvq xij zu'g ei Jyenq ninb lcvd Eei waag zruj.’
23.37: “ye-lu-saa-lem zivb aa'b! ye-lu-saa-lem zivb! meib taij trug waag myenb yaag zx'q la'pyeiq zov taig Tinb huvb Paaiq mivb meib naaig Eei myenb. Bu'ziaj Rung yia xij Lxq zunq meib Eei myenb, Navq Jaib Eeid puag txn yem Daatg Diaq nx. mq paag meib maiq Kavq pun yia zruj.
23.39: yia Buaj meib Bua, yem naaiq mivb meib Bua maiq tu'q pwatg yia. zuaq meib Bua kxvq, ‘Toq Tinb huvb Zeij fu'q tevq zyruq Eei Buaj taaib uaq taub’ Zivj tu'q pwatg yia.”
23.4: ninb Bua zx'q Niaq Eei, a'g tu'q Eiaj Eei ka'naaiq Paanj pun myenb Eiaj, mq paag ninb Bua kanb lyemb maiq Kavq lovg yetg nxm puab Do'q Tevj myenb prub.
23.10: yaag maiq tuvq pun myenb heug meib Bua zruj ‘pyeiq zeiq,’ weig zu'g meib Bua maaib Du'g taub pyeiq zeiq Navq, tovb yia, ki-tug.
23.22: haiq taub zyavq Jyenq Tinb txvb lcvd waag, ninb zuvq zyavq Jyenq Tinb huvb Eei weig yaag zyavq Jyenq zweid weig uaq taub Tinb huvb lcvd waag.
23.12: haiq taub Taaib kanb zruj Lo, Tinb huvb xij pun uaq taub zruj faij. haiq taub Eyemg kanb zruj faij, Tinb huvb xij pun uaq taub zruj Lo.
23.15: “meib Bua peib za'g Hruq Fwrtq Faauj leid Eei finb scv Zauj faa-li-sij myenb aa'b! meib Bua xij pwavb zu'g Kruq a'q. meib Bua Jiaj Kxiq Jiaj kua'q weig lxd tu'q Du'g laanb myenb taaib pia'g meib Bua. pia'g liud, meib Bua zruj pun ninb xij zu'g Dxtq teig Eua'g kaub Zamq meib Bua i kruq.
23.13: “meib Bua peib za'g Hruq Fwrtq Faauj leid Eei finb scv Zauj faa-li-sij myenb aa'b! meib Bua xij pwavb zu'g Kruq a'q. meib Bua txv Jyenq myenb Eei Myen kwrn pia'g Tinb huvb Eei kua'q uaq taub kcvb. meib Bua kanb maiq pia'g. myenb xij pia'g meib Bua yaag tavq Jyenq maiq pun pia'g.
23.1: Jiaj taaib, ye-su Buaj zwavj myenb Zauj ninb Eei saib kxj,
23.26: “mziv mcvb Eei faa-li-sij myenb aa'b! Raauj Rxmg yenq xij zu'g Raauj Revg ka'Euad Daavg. lyemb ka'Eiag zyrug Revg mig a'q.
23.25: “meib Bua peib za'g Hruq Fwrtq Faauj leid Eei finb scv Zauj faa-li-sij myenb aa'b! meib Bua xij pwavb zu'g Kruq a'q. meib Bua Raauj meib Bua Eei Rxmg yenq, Kuvj Raauj ka'Eiag Revg Navq. mq paag ka'Euad zaavb pwavq Revg meib Bua Zaavq taaib mauq taaib Eei ka'naaiq.

6.18: weig maiq pun myenb hiuq tu'q meib zei. Kuvj meib mavg maiq pwatg Eei zavg tiaj hiuq Navq. meib Eei zavg tiaj, tovb mavg tu'q pwatg meib kem Jyenq zruj Eei sig, zyrug pun zivb Eeig meib a'q.
6.8: maiq tuvq Navq ninb Bua nx zruj. meib Bua maiq kcvb Toq, meib Bua Eei zavg tiaj zuvq Jaab Daavg hiuq tu'q meib Bua Qyemj zu'g Eei Euvb Euvg.
6.33: kaub lovg Jyenq Jiaj, meib Bua xij zu'g pun Tinb huvb zruj zyruq kunq meib Bua Daavg, yaag xij zu'g ei Revg ninb Eei eij, naaiq teij yetg zuvq Eei ka'naaiq ninb zyrug Jaa Tipq pun meib Bua.
6.3: Zwrtq fim Tevj myenb Jomg myenb uaq zang, lyemb maiq tuvq pun meib zua'g Jiaj Eei lob kcv txig hiuq.
6.32: maiq kcvb syenj Tinb huvb uaq teij myenb haiq zang yaag Kuvj lxd naaiq teij ka'naaiq Navq. meib Bua Eei Tinb txvb tiaj hiuq tu'q meib Bua Qyemj zu'g lovg naaiq teij ka'naaiq.
6.21: meib syru Jaaij Eei ka'naaiq yem haiq nxm txvj, meib Eei Hruq haiq zang yaag Javj Jyenq uaq a'q.
6.14: “sij kxvq myenb txvg meib Bua, meib Bua yaag kwavg pun ninb Bua nx, meib Bua Eei Tinb txvb tiaj yaag kwavg meib Bua Eei zwid.
6.23: meib Eei mziv maiq Fav nx, meib Eei sin zyrug Mwavj a'q. Navq naaig, sij kxvq yem meib ka'Euad Eei Fav Mwavj mivb, zyrug za'kevb Mwavj haig a'q.
6.6: meib tauj kauj Eei zyavb hog, xij zu'g pia'g ken mivb, kwrn Jyenq kcvb, Zauj meib mavg maiq pwatg Eei zavg tiaj kxvq waag. Navq naaig, meib Eei zavg tiaj, tovb mavg pwatg meib kem Jyenq zruj Eei sig, zyrug pun zivb Eeig meib a'q.
6.34: weig naaiq meib Bua maiq tuvq Raub Fav Nxi Eei sig. Fav Nxi Eei sig maaib kauj Fav Nxi Raub. mrud Nxi maaib mrud Nxi Eei sig Raub kauj a'q.
6.2: “uaq Euvg, meib Zwrtq fim Tevj myenb Jomg myenb, maiq tuvq hu hu Yaavq Yaavq Eei zruj, Navq peib za'g Hruq Fwrtq Eei myenb yem wig txvb yaag yem Jaaib hxvg zruj, weig xij pun myenb Zev nx. yia Buaj zyen meib Bua, ninb Bua Eei zivb Eeig ninb Bua tu'q zipq liud a'q.
6.20: xij zu'g weig kanb syru Jaaij Eei ka'naaiq yem uaq Tinb txvb weig zu'g maiq haib Jiaj syruj Jiaj Rivj. kcv yaag maiq haib vaatg waaig. Janb za'g yaag maiq haib petq pia'g taaib nimg.
6.24: “maiq maaib haiq taub haib zruj tu'q i taub zyruq Eei pru. Navq naaig, ninb xij Rxv naaiq taub, xij Namq uaq taub. maiq zei c'q, ninb xij Taaib naaiq taub, xij mavg Piaj uaq taub. meib Bua maiq haib tovb tavb zruj Tinb huvb Eei pru yaag zruj Eaanb Eei pru.
6.28: “meib Bua weig haiq tiug laaij lwib hruj Kwrnj Hruq? Namq mavg kaaj, lomg Eei pc'g hx'g pyavb Navq haiq nx zyavb! pyavb maiq zruj kov, maiq pcv swij Datq Dia.
6.7: “meib Bua tauj kauj Eei zyavb hog, maiq tuvq Paan mivb Pua'q Rwrnj Eei kxvq Navq maiq kcvb hiuq tu'q Tinb huvb uaq teij myenb nx. ninb Bua laaig kxvq waag Zamq Tinb huvb Zivj taaib mwavj tu'q haid ninb Bua tauj kauj Eei waag.
6.29: mq paag yia Buaj meib Bua, lyemb saa-lo-mxn huvb Dovg naaig putq zxib, yaag maiq maaib zxvb zu'q Dovg yetg txq naaiq teij pyavb Rweig.
6.19: “maiq tuvq weig kanb syru Jaaij Eei ka'naaiq yem naaiq paamb ken, weig zu'g haib Jiaj syruj Jiaj Rivj Eei. kcv yaag haib vaatg waaig Revg. Janb za'g yaag haib petq pia'g taaib nimg.
6.17: meib Bua zei maiq Eang haiq Euvg Eei zyavb hog, xij zu'g Raauj Revg Myen, zx'q yrub Raatq Jyenq Ba'pyei paig suv
6.31: “Navq naaig, maiq tuvq Kwrnj Hruq kxvq, ‘yia Bua Navq haiq nx haib lxd tu'q Eang lxd tu'q hopq, lxd tu'q lwib hruj zu'q?’
6.30: lomg Eei miaq ib Nxi zyavb, Fav Nxi Kru Gaai, zu'g trud puaq, mq paag Tinb huvb zxv miaq Rweig. uaq Euvg, Tinb huvb kaub xij zxv meib Bua maiq zeid? meib Bua syenj tu'q hei haig wei'b!
6.27: meib Bua haiq taub laaij Kwrnj Hruq haib px'q tu'q mcvg Daauq teij?
6.11: yia Bua Nxib Nxi Qyemj zu'g Eei Eang hopq, Toq pun kauj ib Nxi Eang.
6.5: “meib Bua haiq zang tauj kauj, maiq tuvq zruj Navq peib za'g Hruq Fwrtq Eei myenb. ninb Bua a'Neiq sruq Jyenq uaq wig txvb yaag sruq uaq Jaaib hxvg Eei Jaub Zaaj tauj kauj weig pun zwavj myenb pwatg. yia Buaj zyen meib Bua, ninb Bua Eei zivb Eeig ninb Bua tu'q zipq liud a'q.
6.9: “meib Bua hxpg zu'g Navq naaiq nx tauj kauj. ‘yia Bua Eei Tinb txvb tiaj aa'b! Toq pun myenb Taaib meib Eei Zivb Revg Buaj.
6.16: “meib Bua zei maiq Eang haiq Euvg uaq zang, maiq tuvq zruj Myen Mwavj Navq peib za'g Hruq Fwrtq Eei myenb zruj. ninb Bua zruj Myen Mwavj Navq Kruq Kruq uaq, xij zwavj myenb zia'q tu'q ninb Bua zei maiq Eang haiq Euvg. yia Buaj zyen meib Bua, ninb Bua Eei zivb Eeig ninb Bua tu'q zipq liud a'q.
6.4: “Navq naaig, maiq maaib haiq taub hiuq tu'q meib zruj naaiq teij Jauq, mq paag meib Eei zavg tiaj, tovb mavg tu'q pwatg meib kem Jyenq zruj Eei sig, zyrug pun zivb Eeig meib a'q.
6.10: Toq pun meib zruj zyruq kunq myenb Eei Nxi Tauj. Toq pun yem naaiq paamb ken Euvb Euvg ei meib Eei eij Zwrtq taaib, Navq yem Tinb txvb Euvb Euvg ei meib Eei eij Zwrtq taaib nx.
6.22: “mziv peiq sin Eei tav. sij kxvq meib Eei mziv Fav nx, zyavb sin zyrug Fav Revg.
6.12: Toq kwavg yia Bua zruj Eei zwid, Navq yia Bua kwavg zruj txvg yia Bua uaq teij myenb Eei zwid nx.
6.15: mq paag myenb txvg meib Bua, meib Bua yaag maiq kwavg nx, meib Bua Eei zavg tiaj yaag maiq kwavg meib Bua Eei zwid.
6.13: maiq tuvq pun yia Bua pwavb seij Hruq Eei sig, mq paag Fruj yia Bua leib Dutq Ywav x'q uaq taub. weig zu'g meib yetg liud maaib huvb livg, maaib Qa'q, maaib Favb laavg, Tauj maang kruq maang txig. aa-men.’
6.1: “meib Bua xij zu'g faij fim. Tinb huvb xij meib Bua zruj Eei Kuq sig maiq tuvq txv zwavj zruj weig pun myenb pwatg. sij kxvq meib Bua txv zwavj zruj, meib Bua maiq tu'q zipq Tinb txvb tiaj pun Eei zivb Eeig.
6.26: mavg kaaj, Daij Daamb luvb Eei nx'g! ninb Bua maiq zwavj haiq Euvg yaag maiq syru tapq lamd. mq paag meib Bua Eei Tinb txvb tiaj wij ninb Bua. meib Bua zuvq kaub Jaaij Jiaj nx'g maiq zeid?
6.25: “weig naaiq yia kxvq Buaj meib Bua, maiq tuvq weig yuvd mcvg Eei Eang hopq Kwrnj Hruq. yaag maiq tuvq weig sin zavg Eei lwib hruj Kwrnj Hruq. mcvg kaub Jaaij Jiaj Eang hopq maiq zeid? sin yaag kaub Jaaij Jiaj lwib hruj maiq zeid?

2.18: “haid myenb yem uaq laa-maa zivb Byrub Byrub puvb siv puvb Qiaj Eei Eyemq. laa-sen Eyemq ninb Eei fu'Jweiq, ninb yaag maiq lovg haiq taub Tevj ninb Jaiq Raub, weig zu'g ninb Eei fu'Jweiq taig mig a'q.”
2.8: naaig liud, he-lotq zyrug Buaj ninb Bua mivb Betg-le-hem muvq. ninb kxvq, “meib Bua kunq mivb Betg-le-hem muvq lovb lovj Eei lxd uaq taub fu'Jweiq. lxd pwatg, Rwrnj taaib Buaj yia, yia zyrug haib mivb paaij ninb.”
2.3: he-lotq huvb mwavj haid naaiq teij waag ninb zyrug Hruq maiq henb yetg teij. yem ye-lu-saa-lem zivb Eei zwavj myenb yetg zuvq yaag Hruq maiq henb Revg.
2.21: yo-sepq zyrug Jiad sin txb Jyenq fu'Jweiq Zauj fu'Jweiq Eei maa Rwrnj i-saa-laa-en teib puv a'q.
2.14: yo-sepq zyrug Jiad sin taaib, luvb mwrnd zang txb Jyenq uaq taub fu'Jweiq Zauj fu'Jweiq Eei maa pyauj mivb i-yipq teib puv,
2.23: yem nxm muvq Buaj heug naa-saa-letq. naaiq teij Jauq Zwrtq taaib txij Revg trug waag myenb Eei waag. uaq teij trug waag myenb kxvq, “myenb xij heug ninb zruj naa-saa-letq myenb.”
2.6: ‘yu-Daa teib puv, Betg-le-hem muvq aa'b! yem yu-Daa teib puv Eei tomb zivb, meib maiq zeid kaub faij Jiaj. weig zu'g maaib taub tomb Jyen xij yem meib naaig Zwrtq taaib txb yia Eei pc'g fivj, i-saa-laa-en myenb.’+”
2.2: naaig kaaj, “Zwrtq seij taaib zruj yiu-Tai myenb Eei huvb uaq taub kub vwaad yem haaij? yia Bua pwatg ninb Eei Leij yem tov puv Zwrtq zyrug taaib paaij ninb.”
2.20: finb myenb kxvq, “Jiad sin taaib, txb uaq taub fu'Jweiq Zauj Jyenq fu'Jweiq Eei maa Rwrnj i-saa-laa-en teib puv a'q og. weig zu'g xij hxig naaiq taub fu'Jweiq Eei mcvg uaq teij taig Revg mig a'q.”
2.7: he-lotq zyrug heug uaq teij samj Leij Eei tomb finb scv taaib, pivj Jyenq lovb lovj Eei naaig kaaj, “uaq nxm Leij zyavb haaij Zwrtq taaib?”
2.19: he-lotq huvb taig mig a'q. yem i-yipq teib puv maaib taub zyruq Eei finb myenb taaib poj Beij yo-sepq.
2.17: naaiq teij sig Zwrtq taaib txij Revg uaq taub trug waag myenb, ye-le-mi, Eei waag. ye-le-mi kxvq,
2.11: pia'g pyauq mivb, pwatg uaq taub fu'Jweiq Zauj ninb Eei maa, maa-li-yaa, zyrug kweig Fiag Dau paaij uaq taub fu'Jweiq. ninb Bua zx'q ninb Bua txb taaib Eei zivb Eeig Zwrtq taaib fovg hxg pun ninb. maaib Jyem Zauj i Euvg Daav Eei Dyavb zuv heug mu-yxg Zauj faan-ken-sen.
2.5: ninb Bua tau, “yem yu-Dia scvq, Betg-le-hem muvq, weig zu'g trug waag myenb Navq naaiq nx fiaq,
2.9: mwavj huvb tiaj kxvq liud, uaq teij tomb finb scv zyrug Zwrtq Jauq mivb a'q. zinb Daavg yem tov puv pwatg Zwrtq uaq nxm Leij mivb Daavg ninb Bua. mivb Tauj fu'Jweiq yem uaq nxm txvj kub vwaaig zyrug tivb Jyenq uaq.
2.16: he-lotq huvb hiuq tu'q uaq teij tomb finb scv Duaq ninb, ninb zyrug Qiaj Jiad! haig. ninb Fiag livg taij Revg Betg-le-hem muvq Zauj Wiv Rwrnj Eei txvj uaq teij i Havj ka'Diaq mcvj Eei kub vwaab txn. he-lotq Navq naaiq nx taij naaiq teij fu'Jweiq ei ninb naaig samj Leij Eei tomb finb scv pwatg Leij Zwrtq Eei zyavb hog funj taaib.
2.4: he-lotq zyrug heug yiu-Tai myenb Eei zwavj sai myenb pyeiq Zauj Faauj leid Eei finb scv taaib Rxib yem zunq zyrug naaig ninb Bua, “zruj ki-tug uaq taub xij Zwrtq seij yem haaij?”
2.10: tomb finb scv pwatg uaq nxm Leij zyrug Fyenb yrub xnb lx'g haig.
2.22: mq paag haid kxvq aan-Ke-laa-atg Ripg ninb Eei tia, he-lotq, zruj yu-Dia scvq Eei huvb, yo-sepq zyrug kamb Riaj maiq mivb uaq a'q. Tinb huvb yaag poj Beij tonq yo-sepq, yo-sepq Bua zyrug mivb kaa-li-li scvq,
2.12: Tinb huvb poj Beij Buaj uaq teij tomb finb scv maiq tuvq Rwrnj he-lotq uaq. ninb Bua zyrug yavb kanb tiub Jauq Rwrnj ninb Bua Eei teib puv.
2.15: yem uaq zuaq Tauj he-lotq taig mivb. Navq naaig Zwrtq taaib weig pun txij Revg zyruq lovg trug waag myenb kxvq Eei waag. ninb kxvq, “yia heug yia Eei txn yem i-yipq teib puv Zwrtq taaib.”
2.13: uaq teij tomb finb scv Rwrnj mig a'q. maaib taub zyruq Eei finb myenb poj Beij Buaj yo-sepq, “Jiad sin taaib, txb Jyenq fu'Jweiq Zauj ninb Eei maa pyauj mivb i-yipq teib puv. xij zu'g yem uaq zuaq Tauj yia Buaj meib, weig zu'g he-lotq xij lxd naaiq taub fu'Jweiq taij.”
2.1: ye-su Zwrtq seij yem yu-Dia scvq, Betg-le-hem muvq uaq zang, txij zu'g he-lotq zruj huvb tiaj. Ga'haaq maaib teij samj Leij Eei tomb finb scv yem tov puv taaib Tauj ye-lu-saa-lem zivb

20.18: “mwavj og. Bua mivb ye-lu-saa-lem zivb. Tauj uaq, paamb myenb Eei txn, zyrug zu'g Jiu pun sai myenb pyeiq Zauj Faauj leid Eei finb scv. ninb Bua xij tivg taij ninb,
20.8: “aaq lamb Mwavj, Wivb zyruq Buaj ninb Eei kunq kov myenb, ‘heug kovb myenb taaib Kxi kovb zinb pun ninb Bua a'q. tovb taaib zruj Ga'haaq uaq teij xij zu'g pun Daavg. taaib Daavg uaq teij xij zu'g pun Ga'haaq.’
20.33: ninb Bua tau, “zyruq aa'b! Toq pun yia Bua Eei mziv haib mavg tu'q pwatg.”
20.3: “luvb tomb Dxm Duab nxm zyavb hog, Wivb zyruq cvj mivb uaq hei pwatg teij myenb sruq Jyenq uaq, maiq zruj haiq Euvg.
20.32: ye-su zyrug tivb Jyenq heug ninb Bua taaib, naaig ninb Bua, “meib Bua xij yia Tevj haiq Euvg meib Bua?”
20.21: ye-su naaig, “meib xij lovg haiq Euvg?” ninb tau, “zyruq aag, Toq meib lcvd meib tu'q zruj huvb Eei zyavb hog xij zu'g pun yia Eei i taub txn, yetg taub zweid meib Eei Byaaug mcvj, yetg taub zweid zaaij mcvj.”
20.14: txb Jyenq meib Eei kovb zinb Rwrnj a'q og. Ga'haaq Zivq naaiq taub yia xij pun Zauj meib fib Bua'g.
20.23: ye-su Buaj ninb Bua, “yia hopq Eei zaanq meib Bua za'kevb xij zu'g hopq. mq paag yia maiq maaib leid Paaiq haiq taub zweid yia Eei Byaaug mcvj fai zaaij mcvj. yia Eei tia liug leid zyavj pun haiq taub zweid, uaq teij zyrug tu'q zweid a'q.”
20.6: luvb maanb Mwavj teij, aaq lamb pyaa nxm zyavb hog, Wivb zyruq cvj mivb uaq hei pwatg teij myenb sruq Jyenq uaq. ninb zyrug kxvq, ‘meib Bua weig haiq tiug zyavb Nxi sruq Jyenq naaig henb henb Eei, maiq zruj haiq Euvg?’
20.34: ye-su Kxb lyenb haig zyrug Lua ninb Bua Eei mziv. ninb Bua lyemb zeib haib mavg tu'q pwatg, zyrug kan Jyenq ye-su mivb mig a'q.
20.2: Zauj kovb myenb tivg zyavj pun hxpg myenb Prub Tov Zivq yetg Nxi Eei kovb zinb, Wivb zyruq zyrug Paaiq ninb Bua mivb uaq Wivj zruj kov.
20.20: uaq zang sej-Be-Di Eei auq txb ninb Eei i taub txn taaib ye-su uaq, kweig Fiag paaij, Toq yetg Euvg.
20.24: uaq teij zyepg taub saib kxj haid liud naaiq teij sig zyrug Qiaj Jiad haig naaiq teij i muad.
20.28: Navq yia, paamb myenb Eei txn nx, yia maiq zeid taaib xij myenb fub suj yia. yia taaib fub suj myenb yaag siaq yia Eei mcvg weig zua'g myenb Zamq Rwrnj.”
20.7: “ninb Bua tau, ‘weig zu'g maiq maaib myenb Zivq yia Bua zruj kov.’ “Wivb zyruq zyrug kxvq, ‘uaq Euvg, meib Bua yaag mivb uaq Wivj zruj kov maa'b!’
20.29: ye-su Zauj ninb Eei saib kxj Bua Zwrtq ye-li-Ko zivb uaq zang, maaib myenb Zamq Eei kan Jyenq ye-su mivb.
20.19: Ga'haaq zx'q ninb Jiu pun Janj. Janj zyrug kwatg to'g Jyetq, lovg pyaab pin Bx'q, cvj zx'q ninb tiv zyepg Ravg Jaaj. mq paag Ga'haaq pua Nxi, Tinb huvb xij pun ninb navb taaib.”
20.17: ye-su yavb Jauq mivb ye-lu-saa-lem zivb uaq zang, ninb txb ninb Eei zyepg Eeig taub saib kxj mivb Pyen teij kxvq Buaj ninb Bua,
20.31: zwavj myenb hemj ninb Bua, Buaj ninb Bua maiq tuvq Ko lo. mq paag ninb Bua Jaa heug kaub Bwi, “zyruq, Daa-witq Eei zeib fun aa'b! Kxb lyenb yia Bua maa'b!”
20.30: maaib i taub mziv mcvb Eei myenb zweid Jyenq Jaub Len haid kxvq ye-su yavb naaiq tiub Jauq Jiaj. ninb Bua zyrug heug, “zyruq, Daa-witq Eei zeib fun aa'b! Kxb lyenb yia Bua maa'b!”
20.27: haiq taub xij zruj Lo Jiaj, uaq taub xij zu'g zruj meib Bua Eei nrub.
20.11: ninb Bua zipq kovb zinb mivb yaag vopq Wivb zyruq.
20.5: “luvb zyavj aanj zyepg Eeig nxm zyavb hog, cvj Zauj Fiag aanj pua nxm zyavb hog, ninb fib Navq Eei lxd myenb zruj kov.
20.9: “tovb pyaa nxm zyavb hog Zivj tu'q Jiad kxn zruj kov uaq teij tu'q pwavq yetg Nxi Eei kovb zinb.
20.16: ye-su cvj kxvq setq mweid waag. “Navq naaig, Ga'haaq uaq teij xij tu'q yem uaq Daavg. yem uaq Daavg Eei xij zu'g yem Ga'haaq.”
20.4: ninb zyrug kxvq, ‘meib Bua yaag mivb yia Eei Wivj zruj kov maa'b! kovb zinb hxpg zu'g Bu'ziaj yia zyrug pun Bua'g uaq meib Bua.’ ninb Bua zyrug mivb a'q.
20.10: Navq naaig, Zivq Daavg uaq teij laaig xij tu'q kaub Zamq. mq paag ninb Bua fib Navq Eei tu'q pwavq yetg Nxi Eei kovb zinb Navq.
20.22: ye-su tau uaq teij i taub txn, “meib Bua Toq Eei meib Bua maiq hiuq. meib Bua haib hopq tovb yia xij zu'g hopq uaq nxm zaanq Eei fai?” ninb Bua tau, “yia Bua haib hopq Eei.”
20.12: ninb Bua kxvq, ‘Ga'haaq taaib uaq teij Kuvj zruj Du'g nxm zyavb hog Eei kov Navq nyaa. Eaanb meib Zxg pun Zauj yia Bua fib Bua'g Eei. yia Bua zyavb Nxi zu'g Eutg Pwi yaag zruj kov kaub Kruq ninb Bua.’
20.15: yia kanb Eei Eaanb maiq zeid sweib yia kanb lovg? pwatg yia zruj Hruq lovj meib mweig Jia'q fai?’+”
20.13: “Wivb zyruq zyrug tau taub uaq teij kovb myenb. ‘yrud aag, yia maiq zeid Pyenj meib lx'g. meib maiq zeid Zauj yia kxvq tivg ziuj kovb Nxi Eei kovb zinb fai?
20.1: “Tinb huvb zruj zyruq kunq myenb se Navq taub a'vung Wivj Eei zyruq nx. luvb Dxm Ryruq Eei, ninb Zwrtq mivb lxd myenb Tevj ninb zruj a'vung Wivj Eei kov.
20.26: mq paag meib Bua maiq hxpg zu'g Navq naaig. haiq taub xij tu'q zruj Lo, uaq taub xij zu'g zruj meib Bua Eei pru.
20.25: ye-su heug ninb Bua yetg zuvq taaib Rxib yaag kxvq, “meib Bua hiuq tu'q Janj maaib tomb Jyen kunq ninb Bua. zruj Lo Eei uaq teij maaib livg hatg ninb Bua.

24.18: yem Deig Eei myenb maiq tuvq Rwrnj pyauq zx'q kanb Eei tomb lwi.
24.45: “uaq Euvg, haiq taub zruj Hruq zivj, Zovb mevb Eei pru? uaq taub c'q, zyruq Paaiq kruj ninb Eei pyauq zov myenb yaag ziuj zyavb hog zx'q yetg zwavj pru Eei pwrng Eang hopq pun ninb Bua.
24.3: ye-su zweid Jyenq ka'lanq Bov uaq zang, saib kxj Bua kanb levg Jeiq taaib naaig ninb, “Toq Buaj yia Bua og. naaiq teij sig haiq zang xij Zwrtq? maaib haiq Euvg Javb hog xij pun Ziv meib cvj xij taaib yaag pun Ziv paamb ken Eei setq mweid xij Tauj?”
24.43: naaiq meib Bua hiuq tu'q Eei. sij kxvq pyaub zyruq hiuq tu'q luvb mwrnd zang Janb za'g haiq nxm zyavb hog taaib, ninb zyrug kiv Hruq zuaq Jyenq, maiq pun Janb za'g pia'g pyauq.
24.50: pru Javj maiq zaaig Eei Nxi, Javj maiq zaaig Eei zyavb hog, ninb Eei zyruq zyrug Rwrnj taaib a'q.
24.14: Tinb huvb zruj zyruq kunq myenb Eei Kuq fyenj zuvq xij zunb pwavq luvb Diaq weig zruj zxvb zevj pun maang fivj hiuq. Ga'haaq, setq mweid Eei Nxib Eia'g zyrug Tauj a'q.
24.48: mq paag sij kxvq uaq taub pru maiq penj, ninb yem Hruq Namq, ‘aa, yia Eei zyruq maiq kcvb Rwrnj syepq.’
24.34: yia kxvq zyen Buaj meib Bua, naaiq txig myenb kwei seij maiq kcvb Revg, naaiq teij yetg zuvq sig zyrug Zwrtq taaib a'q.
24.2: ye-su kxvq, “meib Bua pwatg naaiq teij pyauq Eei saa'b? yia Buaj zyen meib Bua, maaib nxm Nxi yetg zuvq xij zu'g Zc'q Revg. maiq maaib yetg Kwaaiq la'pyeiq lapq Jyenq a'q.”
24.36: “uaq nxm Nxi, uaq nxm zyavb hog, maiq maaib haiq taub hiuq. lyemb Tinb txvb Eei finb myenb maiq hiuq. txn yaag maiq hiuq. Kuvj zavg tiaj kanb hiuq Navq.
24.35: luvb Dau xij Jiaj Revg, mq paag yia Eei waag yetg liud maiq Jiaj.
24.24: weig zu'g maaib myenb kxvq ninb Bua zruj ki-tug mq paag Jaaq Eei, cvj maaib Jaaq trug waag myenb xij Zwrtq taaib. ninb Bua xij zruj tomb Javb hog Zauj Bua'g hxvb Eei sig Duaq myenb. sij kxvq haib Duaq tu'q zu'g nx, ninb Bua xij lyemb Tinb huvb kinq taaib Eei myenb Duaq.
24.7: naaiq fivj xij Zauj uaq fivj Bx'q Jaaj. naaiq nxm kua'q xij Zauj uaq nxm kua'q Bx'q tomb Jaaj. maaib teij txvj xij zu'g vxg Naavj, maaib teij txvj Dau tovd.
24.17: myenb yem pyaub vxb xij zu'g kaanq Fiag, lyemb maiq tuvq pia'g pyauq zx'q haiq Euvg txb mivb.
24.49: ninb zyrug tovd sin Bx'q ninb Eei zruj pru txig yaag Zauj hopq tiuq Gwin Eei myenb Jwavg Eang Jwavg hopq.
24.11: cvj maaib Jaaq trug waag myenb Zamq Eei Zwrtq taaib Duaq myenb Zamq.
24.33: fib Navq Eei, meib Bua pwatg naaiq teij yetg zuvq sig Zwrtq uaq zang, meib Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q yia, paamb myenb Eei txn, Tauj fatq a'q, zuvq yem Jyenq kcvb Daavg a'q.
24.16: uaq zang, yem yu-Dia scvq uaq teij xij zu'g pyauj faauj Bov.
24.40: uaq zang maaib i laanb myenb yem uaq Deig zruj kov. xij zipq laanb mivb, kwavg laanb yem uaq.
24.37: no-yaa Eei luvb Diaq Navq haiq nx, yia, paamb myenb Eei txn, cvj taaib uaq zang yaag xij zu'g Navq uaq nx.
24.4: ye-su tau, “xij zu'g faij fim, maiq tuvq mwavj haiq taub Duaq meib Bua.
24.51: zyruq xij tivg ninb Eei zwid Niaq Eei, zung ninb mivb Zauj peib za'g Hruq Fwrtq Eei myenb yem, puvb siv puvb Qiaj Eei Eyemq, vaatg Jyenq Eaab tiaq.”
24.12: Ywav x'q Eei sig xij faanq, myenb Zamq Eei Hruq zyrug namj Jyenq Fiag, maiq Namq myenb yaag maiq Namq Tinb huvb.
24.46: zyruq Rwrnj taaib pwatg naaiq taub pru zruj tu'q zivj, pru zyrug Fyenb yrub a'q.
24.13: mq paag haiq taub tiaq tu'q Tauj taaub Tauj mweid, uaq taub zyrug tu'q Fruj a'q.
24.26: “Navq naaig, sij kxvq maaib myenb Buaj meib Bua, ‘mavg maa'b! ninb yem uaq teib puvb Waav,’ maiq tuvq Zwrtq mivb lxd. myenb cvj kxvq, ‘mavg maa'b! ninb yem pyauq ka'Euad,’ maiq tuvq syenj.
24.28: ka'naaib taig yem haaij, tomb Jaavb vovb yaag yem uaq a'q.
24.8: naaiq teij sig Zwrtq taaib pun Ziv setq mweid Eei Nxib Eia'g Jiad kxn Zwrtq.
24.9: “Tauj uaq zang meib Bua zyrug zu'g zx'q Jiu pun myenb zruj to'g yaag taij kwavg. laaij yia, maang fivj xij Rxv meib Bua.
24.32: “meib Bua xij zu'g lovg vovb Exj Dyavj ho'g yetg tiug. pwatg Dyavj Zwrtq Zunj, Gxi nxmb lunj, meib Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q aaq lamb teij pia'g haag kweij mig a'q.
24.21: weig zu'g Tauj uaq zang maaib tomb ze'g naang. yem zeij luvb zeij Dau taaib maiq maaib Jiaj Dovg naaiq Rung syem. yavb naaiq Jiaj yetg liud yaag maiq maaib a'q.
24.23: “uaq zang, sij kxvq haiq taub Buaj meib Bua, ‘mavg kaaj, ki-tug yem naaiq!’ fai ‘ki-tug yem uaq!’ maiq tuvq syenj.
24.6: Tauj uaq zang meib Bua tu'q haid myenb Bx'q tomb Jaaj yaag haid Bx'q tomb Jaaj Eei fyenj, mq paag meib Bua maiq tuvq kamb Riaj. naaiq teij sig Dovg haaij xij zu'g Zwrtq, mq paag setq mweid Eei Nxib Eia'g maiq kcvb Tauj.
24.44: Navq naaig, meib Bua xij zu'g liug leid zyavj, zanb zang zuaq Jyenq, weig zu'g meib Bua lyemb Javj maiq zaaig Eei zyavb hog, yia, paamb myenb Eei txn, zyrug Tauj a'q.
24.20: meib Bua xij zu'g Toq Tinb huvb, Tauj pyauj Eei zyavb hog maiq tuvq pun txij zu'g tovb ken Nxi fai txij zu'g tivb kov Nxi.
24.5: maaib myenb Zamq Eei xij lovg yia Eei Buaj taaib kxvq, ‘yia se tovb ki-tug uaq taub a'q.’ ninb Bua zyrug Duaq myenb Zamq.
24.19: yem uaq teij Nxib Eia'g maaib Jyenq sin Eei, Zauj maaib kub vwaad hopq Exj Eei msia'q txn za'kevb zu'g Kruq a'q.
24.38: Byuvb swib imj maiq kcvb yemj luvb Diaq uaq zang, myenb Eang yaag hopq, puvj sia'q, kxvq auq zruj Zivb Jaa, Tauj no-yaa pia'g Ravq uaq Nxi.
24.31: maaib Ratg Eei Qiaj Bwi, yia zyrug Paaiq yia Eei finb myenb mivb Tauj pyei puv Ryaauj, yem naaiq puv luvb kxn mivb Tauj uaq puv luvb kxn, syru zunq yia kinq taaib Eei myenb.
24.27: weig zu'g pxvd Ba'livg yem tov puv Fapg tavb, Fav mivb Tauj fai puv Navq haiq nx, yia, paamb myenb Eei txn, cvj taaib uaq zang yaag xij Navq uaq nx.
24.41: maaib i taub msia'q txn mxg mc'g. xij zipq taub mivb, kwavg taub yem uaq.
24.1: ye-su yem zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Zwrtq taaib, yavb Jyenq Jauq mivb uaq zang, saib kxj Bua taaib nu'q Jyenq zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyaub Len uaq teij pyauq heug ninb mavg.
24.39: ninb Bua lyemb maiq hiuq Byuvb swib imj xij yemj Tauj uam kwaatq ninb Bua mivb Revg. yia, paamb myenb Eei txn, cvj taaib uaq zang yaag xij Navq naaig nx.
24.47: yia Buaj zyen meib Bua, zyruq xij pun naaiq taub pru kruj Revg ninb Eei yetg zuvq Jaab tivb.
24.10: uaq zang myenb Zamq xij Zwrtq, maiq syenj yia. laanb xij zx'q laanb Jiu pun winb wavq. laanb yaag xij Rxv laanb.
24.25: mwavj og. naaiq teij sig maiq kcvb Zwrtq yia Jaab Daavg Buaj zyavj meib Bua.
24.22: sij kxvq Tinb huvb maiq pun uaq teij Nxib Eia'g zo'g Fiag teij, maiq maaib haiq taub tu'q mcvg Zwrtq. se weig Tinb huvb kinq taaib Eei myenb ninb Zivj taaib xij pun uaq teij Nxib Eia'g zo'g Fiag.
24.42: “weig naaiq meib Bua xij zu'g kiv Hruq Buvb Jyenq, weig zu'g meib Bua maiq hiuq tu'q meib Bua Eei zyruq haiq Nxi taaib.
24.15: “meib Bua zyrug tu'q pwatg trug waag myenb, Daa-ni-en, kxvq Jiaj Eei sig Zwrtq. maaib zruj pun Euvb Euvg waaig uaq taub tomb Yiab yruj yem Jyenq Zivb Revg Eei txvj, (to'g sru Eei myenb xij zu'g mevb pc'g naaiq teij waag).
24.29: “uaq teij Nxi Eei ze'g naang yetq Jiaj liud, ‘Ba'Nxi zyrug Jia'q mivb, Laaj yaag maiq ziuj Fav a'q. zwavj Leij yem uaq luvb xij Dxtq Fiag taaib. yem luvb maaib Qa'q Eei ka'naaiq zuvq zu'g Dang tovd.’
24.30: “uaq zang yia, paamb myenb Eei txn, Eei Javb hog xij yem uaq luvb Zwrtq taaib. luvb Diaq maang fivj myenb zyrug puvb siv puvb Qiaj Eei Eyemq. ninb Bua tu'q pwatg yia, paamb myenb Eei txn, maaib Qa'q Zauj tomb Favb laavg yem uaq Bwrnj Fiag taaib.

28.18: ye-su taaib fatq teij Buaj ninb Bua, “yem luvb yem Dau Eei yetg zuvq hatg maad Tinb huvb Jiu pun yia mig a'q.
28.3: pwatg ninb Eei favj zeiq Navq Ba'livg nx Fav. lwib hruj Bopq pc'g Eei, Navq sxv nx.
28.8: uaq teij msia'q txn yem uaq zruq zyrug Waavb Waav zaavb zaav Eei Tiuj mivb Buaj saib kxj. ninb Bua haid kamb Riaj Eei yrug haid Fyenb yrub haig.
28.19: weig naaiq, meib Bua xij zu'g mivb Faauj maang fivj myenb zruj yia Eei saib kxj. xij zu'g tevq tia, txn Zauj sivj livb Eei Buaj Tevj ninb Bua Jiaj uam Eei leid,
28.9: Tiuj Jyenq mivb kau, ye-su lyemb zeib taaib pwavb ninb Bua yaag kxvq, “pcvb xn Eei saa'b?” uaq teij msia'q txn zyrug mivb nanq Jyenq ye-su Eei zauj yaag paaij ninb.
28.7: mavg liud, kaanq mivb Buaj ninb Eei saib kxj, ‘ninb navb taaib a'q. ninb mivb kaa-li-li Daavg meib Bua. mivb Tauj uaq meib Bua zyrug tu'q pwatg ninb a'q.’ Javj Jyenq yia Buaj liud meib Bua naaiq teij waag og.”
28.5: finb myenb kxvq Buaj uaq teij msia'q txn, “maiq tuvq kamb Riaj og. yia hiuq tu'q meib Bua lxd tovb zu'g tiv zyepg Ravg Jaaj taig uaq taub ye-su.
28.16: uaq teij zyepg yetq taub saib kxj mivb kaa-li-li scvq, Tauj ye-su heug ninb Bua mivb uaq nxm Bov.
28.20: yaag Faauj ninb Bua ei Revg yia Buaj meib Bua zruj Eei Euvb Euvg. Javj Jyenq og. yia yetg liud Zauj meib Bua yem Tauj paamb ken Eei setq mweid.”
28.17: yetq pwatg ye-su ninb Bua zyrug kweig Fiag paaij ninb. mq paag maaib teij Zxg Hruq maiq tivg.
28.14: sij kxvq naaiq teij sig siv Tauj pi-laatq zuvj Eei mnxmb yia Bua zyrug Tevj meib Bua Jaiq. meib Bua kunq puvj Hruq.”
28.4: zuaq zruq Eei pcv kevb! kamb Riaj haig, sin zinj Revg zyrug Kiv uaq Dau mivb, Navq taig mig a'q nx.
28.2: lyemb zeib Dau tovd seij Eei. maaib taub zyruq Eei finb myenb Fiag taaib Twi Gxi Bc'g zrub kcvb uaq Kwaaiq la'pyeiq, zyrug zweid Jyenq uaq Kwaaiq la'pyeiq kub vwaaig.
28.6: mq paag ninb maiq yem naaiq. ninb ei ninb kanb kxvq Eei waag navb taaib a'q. taaib mavg myenb an ninb uaq nxm txvj maa'b!
28.13: yaag kxvq, “meib Bua xij zu'g kxvq, ‘luvb mwrnd zang meib Bua mFxmb mivb, ninb Eei saib kxj taaib nimg ye-su Eei sei mig a'q.’
28.12: sai myenb pyeiq Zauj myenb koj kapq zunq Zaavb laavb. Zaavb laavb liud, zyrug zx'q Eaanb Zamq Eei Rwid pun pcv
28.15: pcv zipq uaq teij Eaanb yaag ei Jyenq sai myenb pyeiq Zauj myenb koj Eei waag zruj. naaiq teij Jaub lrug Tauj ib zang yiu-Tai myenb Zxg kxvq Jyenq yem Eei.
28.11: uaq teij msia'q txn kan Jyenq Jauq mivb uaq zang, maaib teij zuaq zruq Eei pcv cvj Rwrnj uaq zivb Buaj sai myenb pyeiq ninb Bua pwatg Zwrtq taaib Eei Euvb Euvg sig.
28.1: Jiaj liud tivb kov Nxi, pia'g uaq nxm leib paaij Eei ta'yetq Nxi, luvb aaq lamb teij Fav, makq-Daa-laa muvq uaq taub maa-li-yaa, cvj Zauj kanb taub maa-li-yaa mivb mavg zruq.
28.10: ye-su Buaj ninb Bua, “meib Bua maiq tuvq kamb Riaj. mivb Buaj yia Eei kxb yrud mivb kaa-li-li scvq og. yem uaq ninb Bua zyrug tu'q pwatg yia.”

7.18: Dyavj lovj maiq haib zyavb maiq penj Eei pyruq. maiq penj Eei Dyavj maiq haib zyavb lovj Eei pyruq.
7.8: weig zu'g haiq taub Toq zyrug tu'q, haiq taub lxd zyrug pwatg. haiq taub vcvq kcvb, kcvb zyrug Gxi.
7.3: “meib weig haiq tiug pwatg meib Eei kxb yrud Eei mziv maaib la'fapq yaag maiq Namq Tauj meib kanb Eei mziv maaib Ganj Dyavj?
7.21: “heug Jyenq yia, ‘zyruq aa'b! zyruq!’ uaq teij myenb, maiq zeid taub taub haib tu'q pia'g Tinb huvb Eei kua'q. Kuvj tovb ei yia Eei Tinb txvb tiaj Eei eij zruj uaq teij tu'q pia'g Navq.
7.14: mq paag pia'g mivb tu'q yetg liud Eei mcvg uaq taub kcvb se hepg Eei. Jauq yaag a'g tu'q yavb. lxd pwatg uaq tiub Jauq Eei myenb zo'g.
7.23: uaq zang yia xij kxvq Buaj ninb Bua, ‘yia lyemb maiq hiuq tu'q meib Bua nyaa. meib Bua zruj waaig Eei myenb kaanq pyauj Gxi maa'b!’
7.6: “maiq tuvq zx'q Zivb Revg Eei ka'naaiq pun Juq. kamb Riaj Juq haib taauj sin taaib vaatg meib Bua. yaag maiq tuvq zx'q Jaaij Eei la'pyeib zru zxi pun tuvd. tuvd Kuvj xij Zaaiq waaig Navq.
7.2: weig zu'g meib Bua Navq haiq nx tivg myenb Eei zwid, Tinb huvb yaag Navq uaq nx tivg meib Bua Eei zwid a'q. meib Bua lovg haiq Euvg Laau pun myenb, Tinb huvb yaag lovg uaq Euvg Laau pun meib Bua.
7.20: Navq naaig, meib Bua pwatg ninb Bua zruj Eei sig meib Bua zyrug zia'q tu'q Jaaq trug waag myenb a'q.
7.24: “Navq naaiq, haiq taub haid liud yia naaiq teij waag, yaag ei Jyenq zruj, se Navq yetg taub Zovb mevb Eei myenb komq pyauq la'pyeib pcvb kub vwaaig.
7.28: ye-su kxvq liud naaiq teij waag, zwavj myenb Bua'g hxvb haig ninb Faauj Eei waag,
7.7: “xij zu'g Toq zyrug tu'q, xij zu'g lxd zyrug pwatg, xij zu'g vcvq kcvb, kcvb zyrug Gxi.
7.29: weig zu'g ninb Faauj maiq Navq ninb Bua Eei Faauj leid finb scv. ninb Eei waag maaib hatg maad haig.
7.19: haiq tiub Dyavj zyavb pyruq maiq penj, zuvq zu'g kxij kwavg puaq trud.
7.17: Dyavj lovj zyavb lovj Eei pyruq. Dyavj maiq penj zyavb maiq penj Eei pyruq.
7.27: twib tomb Byuvg, uam Lo kwaatq, pxvd tomb Ryaauj pwrng pyauq, pyauq zyrug Baav. lomd! lomd Eei Baav mig a'q.”
7.11: meib Bua Dovg naaig waaig Eei myenb zuvq hiuq tu'q pun lovj Eei ka'naaiq meib Bua Eei fu'Jweiq, meib Bua Eei Tinb txvb tiaj yetg zei xij pun lovj Eei ka'naaiq Toq ninb uaq teij myenb.
7.5: peib za'g Hruq Fwrtq Eei myenb aa'b! xij zu'g zx'q Zwrtq kanb Eei mziv uaq Ganj Dyavj Daavg Zivj taaib haib mavg tu'q zyen Tevj kxb yrud pan Zwrtq mziv Eei la'fapq.
7.9: “meib Bua haiq taub myenb, ninb Eei txn Toq Fuaq, meib xij pun la'pyeiq ninb fai?
7.16: meib Bua samj mavg ninb Bua zruj Eei sig meib Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q ninb Bua a'q. Dyavb Fimq maiq haib zyavb a'vung pyruq. muvq lov Fimq yaag maiq haib zyavb vovb Exj pyruq.
7.4: kanb Eei mziv maaib Ganj Dyavj, meib fuvg haib Buaj meib Eei kxb yrud, ‘kxj aag, yia Tevj kxj pan Zwrtq mziv Eei la'fapq og.’
7.10: txn Toq Byaud, meib xij pun naav ninb fai?
7.22: Tauj syemq zwid uaq Nxi myenb Zamq Eei xij Buaj yia, ‘zyruq aa'b! zyruq! yia Bua tevq meib Eei Buaj trug Tinb huvb Eei waag, yaag zung myenq Zwrtq, yaag zruj Jiaj Bua'g hxvb Eei sig Zamq.’
7.12: “meib Bua xij myenb Navq haiq nx zruj pun meib Bua, meib Bua yaag xij zu'g Navq uaq nx zruj pun myenb. mo-se Eei leid Zauj trug waag myenb Faauj Eei waag, Rutq zunq kxvq se tovb naaiq a'q.
7.15: “xij zu'g Buvb Jyenq Jaaq trug waag myenb. ninb Bua taaib lxd meib Bua uaq zang, peib zavg Navq pa'ki yuvb, mq paag ninb Bua Eei Hruq Zyruq Navq Yiab Juq nx.
7.13: “xij zu'g pia'g hepg uaq taub kcvb, weig zu'g txb myenb mivb zu'g myetg uaq taub kcvb Javq Eei. Jauq yaag Kub yavb Eei. yavb uaq tiub Jauq Eei myenb Zamq haig.
7.1: “maiq tuvq tivg myenb Eei zwid, Tinb huvb zyrug maiq tivg meib Bua Eei zwid,
7.26: “mq paag haiq taub haid liud yia naaiq teij waag yaag maiq ei Jyenq zruj, zyrug Navq taub myenb Vovj myenb nx. naaiq taub komq pyauq yem saab zyru kub vwaaig.
7.25: twib tomb Byuvg, uam Lo kwaatq, pxvd tomb Ryaauj pwrng pyauq, pyauq yaag maiq Baav, weig zu'g komq la'pyeib pcvb kub vwaaig.

19.18: uaq taub naaig, “haiq teij leib latg?” ye-su tau, “maiq tuvq taij myenb, maiq tuvq Yenj auq, maiq tuvq zruj za'g yaag maiq tuvq zruj Jaaq zxvb zevj.
19.8: ye-su tau, “se laaij meib Bua Hruq vcvg haig mo-se Zivj taaib pun meib Bua haib leib tu'q meib Bua Eei auq. mq paag zinb Daavg, zeij luvb zeij Dau uaq zang, maiq zeid Navq naaig.
19.3: maaib teij faa-li-sij myenb taaib seij ye-su zyrug naaig, “maiq kunq Goj weig haiq Euvg kxnb pcvj leib ninb Eei auq, se hxpg Bua Eei leid fai?”
19.21: ye-su Buaj ninb, “sij kxvq meib xij zruj tunb yunb Eei myenb, xij zu'g mivb maaig Revg meib maaib Eei ka'naaiq, zx'q uaq teij Eaanb pun myenb Jomg myenb. Navq naaiq meib zyrug maaib Jaaij Eei ka'naaiq syru Jyenq uaq Tinb txvb. zruj liud, taaib kan yia og.”
19.14: ye-su kxvq, “kunq pun fu'Jweiq taaib lxd yia, maiq tuvq laanb ninb Bua saa. weig zu'g haiq taub lovg Tinb huvb zruj zyruq kunq ninb, uaq taub se Navq naaiq teij fu'Jweiq nx.”
19.23: ye-su cvj kxvq Buaj ninb Eei saib kxj, “yia kxvq zyen Buaj meib Bua, putg zxib myenb a'g tu'q pia'g Tinb huvb Eei kua'q.
19.6: Navq naaig ninb Bua maiq zeid i taub a'q. penj yetg taub Navq. weig naaiq, Tinb huvb kapq taaib Eei Zaib txij, myenb maiq tuvq Zc'q Gxi.”
19.2: myenb Zamq haig kan Jyenq ye-su mivb, ninb zyrug yem uaq zxg lovj ninb Bua Eei pcvg.
19.20: uaq taub myenb lunj myenb kxvq, “naaiq teij yetg zuvq Eei leid yia mwavj Revg a'q. cvj Zaa haiq Euvg xij zu'g zruj fai?”
19.24: yia cvj kxvq Rung Buaj meib Bua, lxb Txb Zunj Jiaj simb Bywig Zxg kaub huvb heg putg zxib myenb pia'g Tinb huvb Eei kua'q.”
19.28: ye-su Buaj ninb Bua, “yia kxvq zyen Buaj meib Bua, maaib syavb luvb syavb Dau uaq zang, yia, paamb myenb Eei txn, zweid Jyenq yia Favb laavg Eei weig Eei zyavb hog, meib Bua kan yia Eei myenb zyrug tu'q zweid Jyenq zyepg Eeig nxm weig syemq uaq teij zyepg Eeig fivj i-saa-laa-en myenb.
19.7: faa-li-sij myenb cvj naaig ye-su, “uaq Euvg, mo-se weig haiq tiug Buaj Goj pun zeiq leib Zai sru ninb Eei auq zyrug heug auq mivb a'q?”
19.29: haiq taub weig yia kwavg ninb Eei pyauq, muab txig, tiaj maag, fu'Jweiq fai livb teig, uaq taub kwavg yetg kruq zyrug tu'q yetg pc'q kruq yaag tu'q yetg liud Eei mcvg.
19.19: xij zu'g Tovj nimg meib Eei tiaj maag, yaag Namq myenb Navq Namq kanb nx.”
19.17: ye-su tau, “meib weig haiq tiug naaig yia Tauj lovj Eei sig? Kuvj maaib Du'g taub lovj Navq. sij kxvq meib xij tu'q yetg liud Eei mcvg, xij zu'g ei Jyenq leib latg zruj.”
19.30: mq paag maaib zruj Lo Eei myenb Zamq xij zu'g zruj faij. zruj faij Eei maaib Zamq yaag tu'q zruj Lo.
19.27: pi-te zyrug kxvq, “saib tiaj aa'b! yia Bua kwavg Revg Euvb Euvg taaib kan meib. uaq Euvg, yia Bua haib tu'q haiq Euvg?”
19.11: ye-su tau, “naaiq teij Faauj Eei waag, maiq zeid taub taub haib ei Jyenq zruj. Kuvj tovb tu'q Tinb huvb Eei en Eei myenb haib ei Jyenq zruj Navq.
19.5: Tinb huvb yaag kxvq, ‘weig naaiq mJavg txn txv Jaa, leib ninb Eei tiaj maag, Zauj ninb Eei auq kapq Jyenq. i taub zyrug penj yetg nxm sin mig a'q.
19.9: yia Buaj meib Bua, haiq taub leib ninb Eei auq, yaag maiq zeid laaij ninb Eei auq Yenj Goj nx, cvj mivb lovg syavb auq, ninb se Yenj auq Navq.”
19.16: maaib Rung maaib taub myenb taaib naaig ye-su, “finb scv aag, yia hxpg zu'g zruj haiq Euvg lovj Eei sig Zivj tu'q yetg liud Eei mcvg?”
19.4: ye-su tau, “meib Bua maiq to'g Jiaj naaiq trug kivb sru fai? ‘zinb Daavg Tinb huvb zeij luvb zeij Dau uaq zang, ninb zeij Zwrtq myenb taaib penj mJavg msia'q.’
19.10: saib kxj Bua kxvq Buaj ye-su, “sij kxvq lovg auq lovg Goj Eei Jauq Navq naaig nx, yetg liud maiq tuvq lovg kaub lovj.”
19.22: uaq taub myenb lunj myenb haid naaiq teij waag, ninb zyav naaig Raub Raub Eei mivb mig a'q, weig zu'g ninb maaib Jaab tivb hod haig.
19.12: weig zu'g maaib Zamb tiug Jauq pun myenb maiq haib txv Jaa. maaib teij Zwrtq seij zyavb zyrug maiq haib txv Jaa. maaib teij zu'g myenb im toq mivb. maaib teij weig zruj Tinb huvb Eei kua'q Eei kov maiq txv Jaa. haiq taub haib ei Jyenq naaiq teij waag, xij zu'g ei Jyenq zruj a'q.”
19.15: ye-su maan liud naaiq teij fu'Jweiq ninb zyrug mivb mig a'q.
19.13: maaib teij myenb txb fu'Jweiq taaib lxd ye-su, xij ye-su maan Jyenq ninb Bua, Tevj ninb Bua tauj kauj. mq paag saib kxj Bua kxvb hemj naaiq teij myenb.
19.1: ye-su kxvq liud naaiq teij waag zyrug Zwrtq kaa-li-li scvq mivb yu-Dia scvq Jiaj uaq vaang zi'g Jx-Dcn Daaib.
19.26: ye-su mavg Jyenq ninb Bua yaag kxvq, “myenb maiq haib Fruj kanb mq paag maang sig Tinb huvb haib zruj tu'q Eei.”
19.25: saib kxj Bua haid liud naaiq teij waag ninb Bua Bua'g hxvb haig a'q. ninb Bua naaig kaaj, “uaq Euvg, haiq taub haib tu'q Fruj?”

17.18: ye-su hatg myenq, myenq zyrug Zwrtq mig a'q. uaq taub txn lyemb zeib lovj Revg mig a'q.
17.8: ninb Bua zyrug Zau Myen mavg, maiq pwatg haiq taub. Kuvj pwatg ye-su yem uaq Navq.
17.3: naaiq teij pua taub saib kxj cvj pwatg mo-se Zauj e-li-yaa hing Zwrtq taaib Zauj ye-su kxvq waag.
17.21: mq paag Kuvj maaib Du'g Euvg za'eij Navq haib zung naaiq Euvg myenq Zwrtq. xij zu'g tauj kauj, yaag zei maiq Eang haiq Euvg Zivj taaib haib zung tu'q Zwrtq.”
17.14: ninb Bua Rwrnj Tauj zwavj myenb uaq, maaib laanb myenb taaib lxd ye-su, kweig Fiag ye-su Eei Ra'Myen
17.23: ninb Bua xij taij yia, mq paag Ga'haaq pua Nxi Tinb huvb cvj pun yia navb taaib.” saib kxj Bua haid ninb Navq naaiq nx kxvq zyrug Raub haig.
17.6: saib kxj Bua haid naaiq teij Qiaj, ninb Bua za'kevb! kamb Riaj haig, zyrug Baapq Fiag Dau mivb.
17.2: saib kxj Bua mavg Jyenq ye-su uaq zang, pwatg ye-su Tiuq Revg favj zeiq mig a'q. ninb Eei Myen Navq Ba'Nxi nx Fav. ninb Eei lwib hruj yaag Fav haig, Bopq pc'g Eei, zcvb zcvb uaq.
17.20: ye-su tau, “se weig zu'g meib Bua Eei syenj fim faij haig. yia kxvq zyen Buaj meib Bua, sij kxvq meib Bua Eei syenj fim lomb yetg nxm laib Jaaij Eim nx, meib Bua haib Buaj naaiq nxm Bov, ‘yem naaiq swiq mivb yem uaq maa'b!’ Bov zyrug swiq a'q. maiq maaib haiq Euvg meib Bua maiq haib zruj.
17.24: ye-su Zauj ninb Eei saib kxj Bua mivb Tauj Kaa-pe-naa-um muvq uaq zang, syru zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Eei Rrub zinb uaq teij myenb taaib naaig pi-te, “meib Eei saib tiaj maiq Zwrtq zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Eei Rrub zinb fai?”
17.7: ye-su mivb Lua ninb Bua yaag kxvq, “Jiad sin taaib, maiq tuvq kamb Riaj.”
17.19: Ga'haaq saib kxj Bua taaib pivj Jyenq naaig ye-su, “yia Bua weig haiq tiug zung uaq taub myenq maiq Zwrtq?”
17.17: ye-su tau, “meib Bua ib Jaaj Eei myenb aa'b! meib Bua za'kevb maiq syenj, mnxmb yaag hod haig. yia xij zu'g Zauj meib Bua yem Dovg haaij laub? yia xij zu'g Eyend tu'q meib Bua Tauj haiq zang? txb uaq taub txn taaib yia naaiq maa'b!”
17.27: mq paag Bua maiq xij zi'g zwid naaiq teij myenb. meib mivb uaq Kxib txn Batg Byaud. Batg tu'q taaub taub Byaud, zyrug mc'q Gxi Byaud Eei Rwib, pwatg nxm zinb, txb mivb pun ninb Bua kauj meib Zauj yia Zwrtq Eei Rrub zinb.”
17.11: ye-su tau, “e-li-yaa za'kevb xij taaib liug leid zyavj Euvb Euvg Navq lod uaq nx.
17.5: pi-te Zxg kxvq Jyenq waag uaq zang, maaib txq Bwrnj Fav Eei taaib om Jyenq ninb Bua. cvj maaib Qiaj yem uaq Bwrnj kxvq, “naaiq se yia Eei txnb Namq. yia a'Neiq haig ninb. mwavj ninb maa'b!”
17.9: yem Bov Fiag uaq zang, ye-su nc'g waag saib kxj Bua. ninb kxvq, “Zinb maang maiq tuvq kxvq naaiq teij hing yaavb Eei sig. zuaq yia, paamb myenb Eei txn, taig mivb, Tinb huvb cvj pun yia navb taaib Zivj taaib kxvq.”
17.16: yia txb ninb taaib lxd meib Eei saib kxj mq paag ninb Bua maiq haib zxg maiq lovj.”
17.4: pi-te zyrug kxvq Buaj ye-su, “zyruq aa'b! yia Bua yem naaiq kevb lovj haig. sij kxvq zyruq xij nx, yia zruj pua nxm liub. zruj nxm pun meib, zruj nxm pun mo-se, cvj zruj nxm pun e-li-yaa.”
17.10: saib kxj Bua naaig ye-su, “Faauj leid Eei finb scv weig haiq tiug kxvq e-li-yaa xij zu'g taaib Daavg?”
17.22: saib kxj Bua yetg zuvq taaib kapq zunq yem kaa-li-li scvq uaq zang, ye-su Buaj ninb Bua, “yia, paamb myenb Eei txn, zuvq xij zu'g Jiu pun myenb.
17.12: mq paag yia Buaj meib Bua, e-li-yaa zuvq taaib liud a'q. myenb yaag zia'q maiq tu'q ninb, sweib eij zruj pun ninb. yia, paamb myenb Eei txn, yaag fib Navq Eei xij zu'g myenb zruj to'g hxig.”
17.15: yaag kxvq, “tomb kxj aag, Toq Kxb lyenb yia Eei txn. ninb putq tuvb Din, Zyru tu'q Kruq haig, zanb zang Kiv pia'g trub Raug yaag Dxtq uam.
17.13: tovb uaq zang saib kxj Bua Zivj taaib mevb pc'g ye-su kxvq Eei waag kxvq zu'g Tevj myenb Jiaj uam Eei leid uaq taub yo-han.
17.1: Jiaj liud Ju'q Nxi, ye-su txb Jyenq pi-te, yaa-kxpg Zauj yaa-kxpg Eei yrud, yo-han, faauj nxm Bovb Lav, levb Eei txvj.
17.26: pi-te tau, “pc'g fivj Zwrtq.” ye-su kxvq, “uaq Euvg, ninb kanb Eei txn maiq zu'g Zwrtq.
17.25: pi-te tau, “Zwrtq Eei.” pi-te pia'g pyauq mivb uaq zang, ye-su zuvq kxvq Daavg mig a'q. ninb naaig, “si-mon aag, meib Navq haiq nx Namq? haiq taub xij zu'g Zwrtq laavb zinb Zauj Rrub zinb pun naaiq paamb ken Eei huvb tiaj? se kanb Eei txn fai pc'g fivj?”

27.18: pi-laatq hiuq tu'q zruj Lo uaq teij yiu-Tai myenb mweig Jia'q ye-su Zivj taaib zx'q ye-su Jiu pun ninb.
27.45: luvb zyavj aanj Eei zyavb hog, uaq nxm teib puv Mwavj Revg Tauj Fiag aanj pua nxm zyavb hog.
27.3: maaig ye-su uaq taub yu-Daatg pwatg ye-su zu'g tivg zwid uaq zang, ninb Hruq mun haig cvj txb uaq teij faab zyepg nxm zinb taaib Twij pun sai myenb pyeiq Zauj myenb koj.
27.66: ninb Bua zyrug mivb Gaapq Jyenq yenj zrub kcvb, yaag pun pcv lovb lovj Eei zuaq Jyenq.
27.43: ninb Kauj Tinb huvb yaag kxvq ninb zruj Tinb huvb Eei txn. uaq Euvg, Bua mavg kaaj Tinb huvb ib zang za'kevb xij Fruj ninb fai maiq Fruj.”
27.50: ye-su cvj heug Rung Bwi Eei liud, zyrug tavj Qiaj mig a'q.
27.14: mq paag ye-su yetg Jruj waag maiq tau ninb. pi-laatq za'kevb Bua'g hxvb haig.
27.48: maaib taub yem uaq Eei myenb lyemb zeib Tiuj mivb zx'q laib Reib sxtq zyemj a'vung tiub swi taaib, lovg lua'g ti'g kwcvq pa'q Jyenq Zunq pun ye-su hopq.
27.34: Tauj uaq ninb Bua zx'q a'vung tiuq Peuj Jyenq im Eei ka'naaiq pun ye-su hopq. mq paag ye-su seij liud, zyrug maiq hopq.
27.2: ninb Bua zyrug Dob ye-su, Ken mivb Jiu pun lo-maa zuvj, pi-laatq.
27.36: Ga'haaq ninb Bua zweid Jyenq uaq zuaq mavg Jyenq ninb.
27.35: ninb Bua zx'q ye-su tiv Jyenq zyepg Ravg Jaaj, cvj zx'q ninb Eei lwib hruj taaib Druq mavg weig pun Gxi.
27.24: pi-laatq pwatg ninb kxvq Jyenq mivb yaag maiq lamb lovg, zuvq kamb Riaj zwavj myenb xij lung Revg. ninb zyrug zx'q uam txv Jyenq zwavj myenb Raauj puad yaag kxvq, “naaiq taub myenb zu'g taig se maiq Paanj Tauj yia. naaiq yetg zuvq Dxtq zu'g meib Bua kanb a'q.”
27.61: makq-Daa-laa muvq Eei maa-li-yaa cvj Zauj kanb taub maa-li-yaa zweid uaq, Myen Win mivb zruq uaq puv.
27.7: ninb Bua zyrug Zaavb laavb taaib lovg naaiq teij Eaanb maaid Rov uaq taub nanq nia zavg Eei Dau, zruj kanb fivj myenb Eei zrub kemb.
27.17: zwavj myenb kapq zunq uaq zang, pi-laatq naaig kaaj ninb Bua, “meib Bua xij yia puvj haiq taub? puvj Baa-lapq-Batg fai puvj ye-su, tovb myenb heug ki-tug uaq taub?”
27.58: yo-sepq mivb lxd pi-laatq, Toq ye-su Eei sei. pi-laatq zyrug Gxi Rwib Jiu ye-su Eei sei pun yo-sepq.
27.49: mq paag maaib teij yem uaq Eei myenb kxvq, “Bua zuaq mavg kaaj, e-li-yaa kevb taaib Fruj ninb Eei fai?”
27.11: uaq zang, ye-su yem pi-laatq zuvj Eei Ra'Myen. pi-laatq naaig ninb, “meib zruj yiu-Tai myenb Eei huvb?” ye-su tau, “zeid Eei. se Navq meib kxvq nx.”
27.33: ninb Bua mivb Tauj nxm txvj, Buaj heug kon-ko-Taa, eij leid se mGxvb Kx'q txvj.
27.16: uaq zang maaib taub zu'g wrnj Jyenq lob Eei zwib myenb Buaj heug Baa-lapq-Batg. haiq taub yaag hiuq tu'q ninb Eei.
27.40: “aaq, meib xij Zc'q zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq, Ga'haaq pua Nxi cvj kanb Zeij Jiad taaib ni! Fruj meib kanb a'q. sij kxvq meib zruj Tinb huvb Eei txn, Fiag zyepg Ravg Jaaj taaib maa'b!”
27.59: yo-sepq zyrug lovg syavb la'maab Dia peu Jyenq ye-su Eei sei,
27.37: yem ye-su Eei mGxvq kub vwaaig ninb Bua fiaq Jyenq koj ninb uaq teij waag. waag kxvq, “naaiq se yiu-Tai myenb Eei huvb, ye-su.”
27.4: ninb kxvq, “yia zruj txvg zwid a'q, weig zu'g yia maaig maiq maaib zwid Eei myenb pun ninb zu'g taig.” uaq teij myenb tau, “naaig maaib haiq Euvg Paanj Tauj yia Bua? naaiq meib kanb Eei sig a'q.”
27.51: yem zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq ka'Euad uaq Kwaaiq Bc'g kcvb Dia yem kub vwaaig Baaij txv ka'Diaq, zruj i mcvj mig a'q. Dau yaag tovd, la'pyeiq yaag Baaij Revg.
27.62: ta'Eeig Nxi, se Tauj tivb kov Nxi, sai myenb pyeiq Zauj faa-li-sij myenb mivb lxd pi-laatq,
27.12: mq paag myenb koj Zauj sai myenb pyeiq koj ninb uaq zang, ninb maiq tau haiq Euvg.
27.46: leib maiq ko Fiag aanj pua nxm zyavb hog, ye-su heug Qiaj Lo Eei kxvq, “e-li, e-li, laa-maa-saa-Bakg-Taa-ni!” eij leid se, “yia Eei Tinb huvb aa'b! yia Eei Tinb huvb! meib weig haiq tiug kwavg yia?”
27.13: pi-laatq zyrug naaig ninb, “ninb Bua koj meib naaiq teij yetg zuvq sig meib maiq haid fai?”
27.26: pi-laatq zyrug puvj Baa-lapq-Batg pun ninb Bua. mq paag ye-su, ninb pun zu'g pyaab pin Bx'q liud, Jiu pun pcv txb mivb tiv zyepg Ravg Jaaj.
27.28: ninb Bua Jaiq Gxi ye-su Eei lwib hruj cvj zx'q teij lwib Daaub si'q Tevj ninb pwij Jyenq,
27.54: zuaq ye-su uaq taub pcvb pyeiq Zauj ninb Eei pcv pwatg Dau tovd yaag pwatg Euvb Euvg sig Zwrtq, hc'q ninb Bua kamb Riaj haig. ninb Bua kxvq, “naaiq taub za'kevb Tinb huvb Eei txn a'q.”
27.63: yaag kxvq, “tomb kxj aag, yia Bua Javj zu'g zinb Daavg Duaq myenb uaq taub loq maiq kcvb taig uaq zang ninb kxvq, ‘Ga'haaq pua Nxi yia cvj navb taaib.’
27.8: weig naaiq uaq Rov Dau maaib Buaj heug “maaib Ryaamq Eei Dau” taaib Tauj ib Jaaj Nxi.
27.9: naaiq teij sig Zwrtq taaib txib tiug trug waag myenb, ye-le-mi, kxvq Eei waag. ye-le-mi kxvq, “ninb Bua zx'q faab zyepg nxm zinb, tovb i-saa-laa-en myenb weig ninb tivg Eei Jaab zinb,
27.32: ninb Bua Zwrtq mivb uaq zang, pwavb zu'g taub sai-lin myenb, Buaj heug si-mon. pcv zyrug aapq si-mon Daam ye-su Eei zyepg Ravg Jaaj.
27.21: pi-laatq zyrug naaig zwavj myenb, “naaiq teij i taub, meib Bua xij yia puvj haiq taub?” ninb Bua tau, “puvj Baa-lapq-Batg.”
27.64: Navq naaig, Toq tomb kxj Fiag livg Paaiq pcv mivb lovb lovj zuaq Jyenq zruq Tauj ta'faam Nxi. Riaj ninb Eei saib kxj haib mivb nimg sei. Ga'haaq haib Buaj zwavj myenb, ‘ninb taig mivb cvj navb taaib a'q.’ sij kxvq Navq naaig, kxvb pc'g naaiq Rung kaub waaig zinb Daavg uaq Rung a'q.”
27.57: luvb maanb Mwavj a'q, maaib taub yem aa-li-maa-Tia muvq Eei putg zxib myenb, Buaj heug yo-sepq, taaib Tauj. ninb yaag zruj ye-su Eei saib kxj.
27.23: pi-laatq cvj naaig ninb Bua, “uaq Euvg, ninb zruj txvg haiq Euvg zwid?” zwavj myenb Jaa heug kaub Bwi, “zx'q ninb tiv Jyenq zyepg Ravg Jaaj maa'b!”
27.6: sai myenb pyeiq Raud naaiq teij Eaanb taaib kxvq, “naaiq teij Eaanb se maaid mcvg Eaanb zyrug Navq kua'q Jyenq Ryaamq nx. Zauj Jyenq zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq uaq teij Eaanb tapq se txvg leid.”
27.55: yem kaa-li-li kan Jyenq ye-su taaib fub suj ninb uaq teij msia'q txn Zamq Eei yaag yem uaq ko teij Eei mavg.
27.44: lyemb tiv ninb Eei ka'Len uaq teij za'g pcv fib Navq Eei kxvq Ki ninb.
27.20: sai myenb pyeiq Zauj myenb koj Duaq zwavj myenb Toq pi-laatq puvj Baa-lapq-Batg, taij ye-su kwavg.
27.5: yu-Daatg zyrug zxi uaq teij Eaanb kwavg uaq zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq ka'Euad Zwrtq mivb, zyrug mivb Diuj Jaav taig mig a'q.
27.56: uaq teij msia'q txn maaib taub makq-Daa-laa muvq Eei maa-li-yaa, maaib yaa-kxpg Zauj yo-sepq Eei maa maa-li-yaa, yaag maaib sej-Be-Di Eei i taub txn Eei maa.
27.53: Zwrtq zruq mivb. ye-su navb taaib uaq zang, uaq teij myenb pia'g uaq nxm Zivb Revg Eei zivb, ye-lu-saa-lem. maaib myenb Zamq Eei tu'q pwatg ninb Bua.
27.19: pi-laatq zweid Jyenq syemq zwid weig uaq zang, ninb Eei auq pun waag mivb Buaj ninb, “maiq tuvq zruj haiq Euvg pun uaq laanb Kuq myenb weig zu'g a'Mwavj yia Beij Beij Tauj naaiq laanb myenb zyrug haid Hruq maiq lovj yetg teij.”
27.38: ninb Bua cvj tiv i taub za'g pcv yem ye-su Eei ka'Len. maaib taub yem Byaaug mcvj. maaib taub yem zaaij mcvj.
27.31: kwatg to'g Jyetq liud, ninb Bua zyrug Jaiq Gxi lwib Daaub si'q, cvj zx'q ninb kanb Eei lwi Tevj ninb zu'q Jyenq zyrug txb ninb mivb tiv zyepg Ravg Jaaj.
27.52: Janb taig zruq yaag Gxi mig a'q. Tinb huvb Eei Zivb Revg pc'g fivj, tovb taig mivb uaq teij, maaib Zamq Eei navb taaib
27.65: pi-laatq Buaj ninb Bua, “uaq Euvg, kunq txb pcv mivb ei meib Bua haib zruj Eei lovb lovj Eei zuaq Jyenq zruq maa'b!”
27.27: pi-laatq zuvj Eei pcv cvj txb ye-su pia'g zuvj Eei ting ka'Euad. uaq kwanb pcv yetg zuvq zyrug mivb weib Jyenq ninb.
27.60: txb mivb zavj syavb la'pyeib zruq. naaiq nxm zruq yo-sepq Zo'q ho'g zu'g taaib lyrub ninb kanb lovg. zavj liud, ninb Twi Kwaaiq tomb la'pyeiq Bc'g Jyenq zrub kcvb, zyrug mivb mig a'q.
27.41: sai myenb pyeiq Zauj Faauj leid Eei finb scv Zauj myenb koj fib Navq Eei Jyetq ninb.
27.1: luvb Dxm Ryruq, zwavj sai myenb pyeiq Zauj yiu-Tai myenb Eei myenb koj kapq zunq Zaavb laavb zyavj Navq haiq nx haib taij ye-su.
27.39: Jiaj Jauq Eei myenb Ki ninb, Wavj Jyenq mGxvq kxvq,
27.47: maaib teij sruq Jyenq uaq Eei myenb haid ninb kxvq naaiq teij waag zyrug kxvq, “oq, ninb heug e-li-yaa.”
27.10: lovg maaid nanq nia zavg Eei Dau, Navq zyruq Buaj yia zruj nx.”
27.25: zwavj myenb tovb Jruj waag tau, “naaiq taub myenb taig, lyrug Zwrtq ninb Eei Ryaamq, yrub yia Bua Zauj yia Bua kanb Eei funb fa'q Daamb txv.”
27.22: pi-laatq zyrug naaig, “uaq Euvg, ye-su, tovb myenb heug ki-tug uaq taub, meib Bua xij yia Navq haiq nx zruj?” ninb Bua yetg zuvq tau, “zx'q ninb tiv Jyenq zyepg Ravg Jaaj!”
27.42: ninb Bua kxvq, “ninb Fruj tu'q myenb mq paag maiq haib Fruj ninb kanb x'g! ninb zruj i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei huvb! sij kxvq ninb ib zang yem zyepg Ravg Jaaj Fiag taaib, yia Bua zyrug syenj ninb a'q.
27.15: Havb Havj Tauj siaj mcvg zipq, lo-maa zuvj maaib leid puvj taub wrnj lob Eei myenb ziuj zwavj myenb Toq puvj haiq taub.
27.29: yaag lovg Fimq Zi'q nxm huvb nivq Dovj Jyenq ninb Eei mGxvq. ninb Bua cvj zx'q lua'g ti'g kwcvq pun ninb Eei Byaaug Jia'q puad nanq Jyenq, cvj kweig Fiag ninb Eei Ra'Myen kwatg to'g Jyetq ninb, yaag kxvq, “yiu-Tai myenb Eei huvb aa'b! zyavb tu'q maang fwij a'q!”
27.30: ninb Bua cvj Twiq uamb Rwib nctq ninb, zx'q uaq tiub lua'g ti'g kwcvq Bx'q ninb Eei mGxvq.

11.18: Tevj myenb Jiaj uam Eei leid uaq taub yo-han taaib uaq zang, ninb zei maiq Eang haiq Euvg, yaag maiq hopq a'vung tiuq. zwavj myenb kxvq, ‘maaib myenq yem ninb Eei sin.’
